K10vimkn_u:127: tā api sarvās tasminn evaikamahāratnacchatre saṃdṛśyante sma /

K10vimkn_u:129: vā devabhavanāni vā nāgabhavanāni vā yakṣabhavanāni vā gandharvāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragabhavanāni
K10vimkn_u:131: tāny api sarvāṇi tasminn evaikamahāratnacchatre saṃdṛśyante sma /

K10vimkn_u:134: Vkn 1.9 tatra sā sarvā parṣad āścaryaprāptā bhagavato 'ntikād idam evaṃrūpaṃ mahāprātihāryaṃ
K10vimkn_u:135: dṛṣṭvā tuṣṭodagrāttamanāḥ pramuditā prītisaumanasyajātā tathāgataṃ namasyatī sthitānimiṣaṃ prekṣamāṇā /
K10vimkn_u:136: Vkn 1.10 atha khalu ratnākaro licchavikumāro bhagavato 'ntikād idam evaṃrūpaṃ mahāprātihāryaṃ
K10vimkn_u:137: dṛṣṭvaikāṃsam uttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena
K10vimkn_u:138: bhagavāṃs tenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantaṃ gāthābhir abhyaṣṭāvīt:
K10vimkn_u:142: amṛtaṃgamā ca varadharmakathā udārā sā sarva śrūyati ito gaganatalātaḥ // 2 //
K10vimkn_u:143: dharmeṇa te jitam idaṃ varadharmarājyaṃ dharmaṃ dhanaṃ ca dadase jagato jitāre /
K10vimkn_u:144: dharmaprabhedakuśalaṃ paramārthadarśin dharmeśvaraṃ śirasi vandami dharmarājam // 3 //
K10vimkn_u:145: na ca nāma asti na ca nāsti giraṃ prabhāṣi hetuṃ pratītya imi saṃbhavi sarvadharmāḥ /
K10vimkn_u:146: naivātra ātmana ca kāraku vedako vā na ca karmu naśyati śubham aśubhaṃ ca kiṃcit // 4 //
K10vimkn_u:147: māras tvayāstu vijitas sabalo munīndraḥ prāptā śivā amṛtaśāntavarāgrabodhiḥ /
K10vimkn_u:148: yasminn avedita na cittamanaḥpracārā sarvakutīrthikagaṇāś ca na yānti gāhaṃ // 5 //
K10vimkn_u:149: cakraṃ ca te triparivarti bahuprakāraṃ prāvartitaṃ praśamanaṃ prakṛtīviśuddham /
K10vimkn_u:150: pratyakṣa devamanujādbhutadharmarājā ratnāni trīṇi upadarśita tatra kāle // 6 //
K10vimkn_u:151: ye tubhya dharmaratanena vinīta samyak teṣām akalpana punaḥ satate praśāntā /
K10vimkn_u:152: vaidyottamaṃ maraṇajātijarāntakāriṃ śirasā nato 'smi guṇasāgaram aprameyam // 7 //
K10vimkn_u:153: satkārasatkṛta na vedhasi merukalpa duḥśīlaśīlavati tulyagatādhimaitrī /
K10vimkn_u:154: gaganaprakāśamanase samatāvihārī ko nāma satvaratane 'smi na kuryu pūjām // 8 //
K10vimkn_u:155: samāgatā te janatā mahāmune mukham udīkṣanti prasannamānasā /
K10vimkn_u:156: sarve ca paśyanti jinaṃ purastāj jinasya āveṇikabuddhalakṣaṇam // 9 //
K10vimkn_u:157: ekāṃ ca vācaṃ bhagavān pramuñcase nānārutaṃ ca pariṣad vijānati /

K10vimkn_u:159: ekāya vācāya udīritāya vāsesi eke apare nividyasi /
K10vimkn_u:160: ākāṅkṣatāṃ kāṅkṣa śamesir nāyako jinasya āveṇikabuddhalakṣaṇam // 11 //
K10vimkn_u:161: vandāmi tvāṃ daśabala satyavikramaṃ vandāmi tvām abhayagataṃ viśāradam /

K10vimkn_u:169: Vkn 1.11 atha ratnākaro licchavikumāro bhagavantam ābhir gāthābhir abhiṣṭutya bhagavantam etad avocat:
K10vimkn_u:170: imāni bhagavan pañcamātrāṇi licchavikumāraśatāni sarvāṇy anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau saṃprasthitāni /
K10vimkn_u:171: tāni cemāni buddhakṣetrapariśuddhiṃ paripṛcchanti ḥ katamā bodhisatvānāṃ buddhakṣetrapariśuddhir iti /
K10vimkn_u:172: tat sādhu bhagavan deśayatu tathāgato 'mīṣāṃ bodhisatvānāṃ buddhakṣetrapariśuddhim /
K10vimkn_u:173: evam ukte bhagavān ratnākarāya licchavikumārāya sādhukāram adāt:
K10vimkn_u:175: sādhu khalu punas tvaṃ kumāra yas tvaṃ buddhakṣetrapariśuddhim ārabhya tathāgataṃ paripṛcchasi /
K10vimkn_u:176: tena hi kumāra śṛṇu sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasikuru /
K10vimkn_u:177: bhāṣiṣye 'haṃ te yathā bodhisatvānāṃ buddhakṣetrapariśuddhim ārabhya /
K10vimkn_u:178: sādhu bhagavann iti ratnākaro licchavikumāras tāni ca pañcamātrāṇi licchavikumāraśatāni bhagavataḥ pratyaśrauṣuḥ /
K10vimkn_u:182: yāvantaṃ bodhisatvaḥ satveṣūpacayaṃ karoti tāvad buddhakṣetraṃ parigṛhṇāti /
K10vimkn_u:183: yādṛśaḥ satvānāṃ vinayo bhavati tādṛśaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ parigṛhnāti /
K10vimkn_u:184: yādṛśena buddhakṣetrāvatāreṇa satvā buddhajñānam avataranti tādṛśaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ parigṛhnāti /
K10vimkn_u:185: yādṛśena buddhakṣetrāvatāreṇa satvānām āryākārāṇīndriyāṇy utpadyante tādṛśaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ parigṛhṇāti /
K10vimkn_u:188: tadyathā ratnākara yādṛśam icched ākāśaṃ māpayituṃ tādṛśaṃ māpayeta,
K10vimkn_u:189: na cākāśaṃ śakyate māpayituṃ nāpy alaṃkartum /
K10vimkn_u:190: evam eva ratnākara ākāśasamān sarvadharmāñ jñātvā /
K10vimkn_u:191: yādṛśam icched bodhisatvaḥ satvaparipākāya buddhakṣetraṃ māpayituṃ tādṛśaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ māpayati,
K10vimkn_u:192: na ca buddhakṣetrākāśatā śakyaṃ māpayituṃ nāpy alaṃkartum /
K10vimkn_u:195: tasya bodhiprāptasyāśaṭhā amāyāvinaḥ satvā buddhakṣetra upapadyante /
K10vimkn_u:197: tasya bodhiprāptasya sarvakuśalasaṃbhāropacitāḥ satvā buddhakṣetre saṃbhavanti /
K10vimkn_u:199: tasya bodhiprāptasya sarvakuśaladharmopasthitāḥ satvās tatra buddhakṣetra upapadyante /
K10vimkn_u:201: tasya bodhiprāptasya mahāyānasaṃprasthitāḥ satvās tatra buddhakṣetre saṃbhavanti /
K10vimkn_u:203: tasya bodhiprāptasya sarvaparityāginaḥ satvās tatra buddhakṣetre saṃbhavanti /
K10vimkn_u:205: tasya bodhiprāptasya sarvābhiprāyasaṃpannā daśakuśalakarmapathasaṃrakṣakāḥ satvās tatra buddhakṣetre saṃbhavanti /
K10vimkn_u:207: tasya bodhiprāptasya dvātriṃśallakṣanālaṃkṛtāḥ kṣāntidamaśamathapāramiprāptāḥ satvā buddhakṣetre saṃbhavanti /
K10vimkn_u:209: tasya bodhiprāptasya sarvakuśalaparyeṣṭiṣv ārabdhavīryāḥ satvā buddhakṣetre saṃbhavanti /
K10vimkn_u:211: tasya bodhiprāptasya smṛtisaṃprajanyasamāhitāḥ satvā buddhakṣetre saṃbhavanti /
K10vimkn_u:213: tasya bodhiprāptasya samyaktvaniyatāḥ satvā buddhakṣetre saṃbhavanti /
K10vimkn_u:215: tasya bodhiprāptasya maitrīkaruṇāmuditopekṣāvihārinaḥ satvā buddhakṣetre saṃbhavanti /
K10vimkn_u:217: tasya bodhiprāptasya sarvavimuktisaṃgṛhītāḥ satvā buddhakṣetre saṃbhavanti /
K10vimkn_u:219: tasya bodhiprāptasya sarvopāyamīmāṃsākuśalāḥ satvā buddhakṣetre saṃbhavanti /
K10vimkn_u:225: tasya bodhiprāptasya sarvāpāyasamucchinnam aṣṭākṣaṇavigataṃ buddhakṣetraṃ saṃbhavanti /
K10vimkn_u:226: svayaṃ śikṣāpadeṣu vartamānā parāpattyacodanatā bodhisatvasya buddhakṣetram,
K10vimkn_u:229: tasya bodhiprāptasya niyatāyuṣo mahābhogā brahmacāriṇaḥ satyānuparivartinyā vācālaṃkṛtā
K10vimkn_u:230: madhuravacanā abhinnaparṣado bhinnasaṃdhānakuśalā īrṣyāvigatā avyāpannacittāḥ samyagdṛṣṭisamanvāgatāḥ
K10vimkn_u:245: tasmāt tarhi kulaputra buddhakṣetraṃ pariśodhayitukāmena bodhisatvena svacittapariśodhane yatnaḥ karaṇīyaḥ /
K10vimkn_u:247: yādṛśī bodhisatvasya cittapariśuddhis tādṛśī buddhakṣetrapariśuddhiḥ saṃbhavati /
K10vimkn_u:249: yadi yādṛśī cittapariśuddhis tādṛśī bodhisatvasya buddhakṣetrapariśuddhiḥ saṃbhavati,
K10vimkn_u:250: tan mā āhaiva bhagavataḥ śākyamuner bodhisatvacaryāṃ carataś cittam apariśuddhaṃ yenedaṃ buddhakṣetram evam apariśuddhaṃ saṃdṛśyate /
K10vimkn_u:251: atha khalu bhagavān āyuṣmataḥ śāriputrasya cetasaiva cetaḥparivitarkam ājñāyāyuṣmantaṃ śāriputram etad avocat:
K10vimkn_u:253: śāriputra mā āhaiva sūryācandramasāv apariśuddhau yaj jātyandho na paśyati /
K10vimkn_u:254: āha: no hīdaṃ bhagavan jātyandhāparādha eṣa na sūryacandramasoḥ /
K10vimkn_u:255: āha: evam eva śāriputra satvānām ajñānāparādha eṣa yas tathāgatasya buddhakṣetraguṇālaṃkāravyūhaṃ kecit satvā na paśyanti,
K10vimkn_u:257: pariśuddhaṃ hi śāriputra tathāgatasya buddhakṣetraṃ yūyaṃ punar idaṃ na paśyatha /
K10vimkn_u:258: Vkn 1.16 atha khalu jaṭī brahmā sthaviraṃ śāriputram etad avocat:
K10vimkn_u:259: mā bhadantaśāriputra tathāgatasyāpariśuddhaṃ buddhakṣetram idaṃ vyāhārṣīt /
K10vimkn_u:261: tadyathāpi nāma śāriputra vaśavartināṃ devānāṃ bhavanavyūhāḥ /
K10vimkn_u:262: īdṛśān vayaṃ buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhān bhagavataḥ śākyamuneḥ paśyāmaḥ /
K10vimkn_u:263: atha khalu sthaviraḥ śāriputro jaṭinaṃ brahmāṇam etad avocat:
K10vimkn_u:264: vayaṃ punar brahmann imāṃ mahāpṛthivīm utkūlanikūlāṃ kaṇṭakaprapātagiriśekharaśvabhragūthoḍigallapratipūrṇāṃ paśyāmaḥ /
K10vimkn_u:266: nūnaṃ bhadantaśāriputrasyotkūlanikūlaṃ cittam apariśuddhabuddhajñānāśayaṃ yenedṛśaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ paśyasi /
K10vimkn_u:267: ye punas te bhadantaśāriputra bodhisatvāḥ sarvasatvasamacittāḥ pariśuddhabuddhajñānāśayās ta imaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ pariśuddhaṃ paśyanti /
K10vimkn_u:268: Vkn 1.17 atha bhagavān pādāṅguṣṭhena imaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātuṃ parāhanti sma /
K10vimkn_u:269: atha khalu tasmin samaye 'yaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātur anekaratnaśatasahasrasaṃcito 'nekaratnaśatasahasrapratyarpitaḥ saṃsthito 'bhūt
K10vimkn_u:270: tadyathāpi nāma ratnavyūhasya tathāgatasyānantaguṇaratnavyūho lokadhātus tādṛśo 'yaṃ lokadhātuḥ saṃdṛśyate sma /
K10vimkn_u:271: tatra sā sarvāvatī parṣad āścaryaprāptā ratnapadmaniṣaṇnam ātmānaṃ saṃjānīte sma /
K10vimkn_u:272: Vkn 1.18 tatra bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputram āmantrayate sma:
K10vimkn_u:274: āha: paśyāmi bhagavan adṛṣṭāśrutapūrvā ime vyūhāḥ saṃdṛśyante /
K10vimkn_u:275: āha: īdṛśaṃ mama śāriputra sadā buddhakṣetram /
K10vimkn_u:276: hīnasatvaparipākāya tu tathāgata evaṃ bahudoṣaduṣṭaṃ buddhakṣetram upadarśayati /
K10vimkn_u:277: tadyathā śāriputra devaputrāṇām ekapātryāṃ bhuñjānānāṃ yathā puṇyopacayaviśeṣeṇa sudhādevabhojanam upatiṣṭhataḥ,
K10vimkn_u:278: evam eva śāriputra ekabuddhakṣetropapannā yathā cittapariśuddhyā satvā buddhānāṃ buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhān paśyanti /
K10vimkn_u:279: Vkn 1.19 asmin khalu punar buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhālaṃkāre saṃdarśyamāne caturaśīteḥ prāṇisahasrāṇām anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittāny utpannāni
K10vimkn_u:280: yāni ca tāni ratnākareṇa licchavikumāreṇa sārdhaṃ pañca licchavikumāraśatāny āgatāni teṣām apy ānulomikyāḥ kṣānteḥ pratilaṃbho 'bhūt /
K10vimkn_u:281: Vkn 1.20 atha bhagavān punar eva tām ṛddhiṃ pratisaṃharati sma /
K10vimkn_u:282: tataḥ punar evedaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ tatsvabhāvam eva saṃvṛtam,
K10vimkn_u:283: tatra śrāvakayānikānāṃ devamanuṣyāṇām ḥ anityā bateme sarvasaṃskārā iti viditvā dvātriṃśatā prāṇisahasrāṇāṃ virajovigatamalaṃ dharmeṣu dharmacakṣur viśuddham /
K10vimkn_u:284: aṣṭānāṃ ca bhikṣusahasrāṇām anupādāyāsravebhyaś cittāni vimuktāni /
K10vimkn_u:285: caturaśīteś ca prāṇisahasrāṇām udārabuddhadharmādhimuktānāṃ Ō viṭhapanapratyupasthānalakṣaṇāḥ sarvadharmā iti viditvānuttarasyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittāny utpannāni // //
K10vimkn_u:287: Vkn 2.1 tena khalu punaḥ samayena vaiśālyāṃ mahānagaryāṃ vimalakīrtir nāma licchaviḥ prativasati sma /
K10vimkn_u:310: sa satvaparipākāyopāyakauśalyena vaiśālyāṃ mahānagaryāṃ prativasati sma /
K10vimkn_u:336: Vkn 2.4 dharmavādī ca vṛddhamadhyadahrasahāyakaś ca lokānuvartanāya /
K10vimkn_u:340: sarvadharmaśravaṇasāṃkathyeṣu ca saṃdṛśyate hīnayānavicchandanāya mahāyāne samādāpanatayā /
K10vimkn_u:355: iti hi vimalakīrtir licchavir evam apramāṇopāyakauśalajñānasamanvāgato vaiśālyāṃ mahānagaryāṃ prativasati sma /
K10vimkn_u:356: Vkn 2.7 sa upāyakauśalyena glānam ātmānam upadarśayati sma /
K10vimkn_u:357: tasya glānasya vaiśālyāṃ mahānagaryāṃ rājarājamahāmātrāmātyakumārapāriṣadyā brāhmaṇagṛhapatayaḥ
K10vimkn_u:358: śreṣṭhinaigamajānapadās tadanyāni ca bahūni prāṇisahasrāṇi glānaparipṛcchakāny upasaṃkrāmanti sma /
K10vimkn_u:360: imam eva cāturmahābhautikaṃ kāyam ārabhya dharmaṃ deśayati sma:
K10vimkn_u:400: tatra yuṣmābhir evaṃrūpe kāye nirvidvirāga utpādayitavyas tathāgatakāye ca spṛhotpādayitavyā /
K10vimkn_u:401: Vkn 2.12 dharmakāyo hi mārṣāḥ tathāgatakāyo dānanirjātaḥ śīlanirjātaḥ samādhinirjātaḥ prajñānirjāto vimuktinirjāto vimuktijñānadarśananirjātaḥ
K10vimkn_u:406: abhijñāvidyānirjātaḥ sarvākuśaladharmaprahāṇāya nirjātaḥ sarvakuśaladharmaparigrahanirjātaḥ satyanirjāto bhūtanirjāto 'pramādanirjātaḥ /
K10vimkn_u:407: apramāṇaśubhakarmanirjāto mārṣās tathāgatakāyas tatra yuṣmābhiḥ spṛhā kartavyā /
K10vimkn_u:408: sarvasatvānāṃ ca sarvakleśavyādhiprahāṇāyānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittāny utpādayitavyāni /
K10vimkn_u:409: Vkn 2.13 evaṃ vimalakīrtir licchavis tathā saṃnipatitānāṃ teṣāṃ glānaparipṛcchakānāṃ
K10vimkn_u:410: tathā tathā dharmaṃ deśayati yad bahūni satvaśatasahasrāṇy anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau
K10vimkn_u:413: Vkn 3.1 atha vimalakīrter licchaver etad abhavat:
K10vimkn_u:415: na ca māṃ tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ samanvāharati,
K10vimkn_u:416: na ca me glānaparipṛcchakaṃ kaṃcit preṣayaty anukaṃpām upādāya /
K10vimkn_u:417: Vkn 3.2 samanvāhṛtaś ca bhagavatā vimalakīrtir licchaviḥ /
K10vimkn_u:418: atha bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputram āmantrayate sma:
K10vimkn_u:419: gaccha tvaṃ śāriputra vimalakīrter licchaver glānaparipṛcchakaḥ /
K10vimkn_u:420: evam ukta āyuṣmāñ śāriputro bhagavantam etad avocat:
K10vimkn_u:421: nāhaṃ bhagavan utsahe vimalakīrter licchaver glānaparipṛcchako gantum /
K10vimkn_u:425: vimalakīrtiś ca licchavir yena tad vṛkṣamūlaṃ tenopasaṃkramya mām etad avocat:
K10vimkn_u:426: Vkn 3.3 na bhadantaśāriputra evaṃ pratisaṃlayanaṃ saṃlātavyaṃ yathā tvaṃ pratisaṃlīnaḥ /
K10vimkn_u:427: api tu tathā pratisaṃlīyaś ca yathā traidhātuke na kāyaś cittaṃ vā saṃdṛśyate /
K10vimkn_u:428: tathā pratisaṃlīyaś ca yathā nirodhāc ca na vyuttiṣṭhasi sarveryāpatheṣu ca saṃdṛśyase /
K10vimkn_u:429: tathā pratisaṃlīyaś ca yathā prāptilakṣaṇaṃ ca na vijahāsi pṛthagjanalakṣaṇeṣu ca saṃdṛśyase /
K10vimkn_u:430: tathā pratisaṃlīyaś ca yathā te na cādhyātmaṃ cittam avasthitaṃ bhaven na bahirdhopavicaret /
K10vimkn_u:431: tathā pratisaṃlīyaś ca yathā sarvadṛṣṭigatebhyaś ca na calasi saptatriṃśatsu ca bodhipakṣyeṣu dharmeṣu saṃdṛśyase /
K10vimkn_u:432: tathā pratisaṃlīyaś ca yathā saṃsārāvacarāṃś ca kleśān na prajahāsi nirvāṇasamavasaraṇaś ca bhavasi /
K10vimkn_u:433: ye bhadantaśāriputra evaṃ pratisaṃlayanaṃ pratisaṃlīyante teṣāṃ bhagavān pratisaṃlayanam anujānāti /
K10vimkn_u:434: Vkn 3.4 so 'haṃ bhagavan etāṃ śrutvā tūṣṇīm evābhūvam /
K10vimkn_u:435: na tasya śaknomy uttare prativacanaṃ dātum /
K10vimkn_u:436: tan nāham utsahe tasya kulaputrasya glānaparipṛcchako gantum /
K10vimkn_u:437: Vkn 3.5 tatra bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ mahāmaudgalyāyanam āmantrayate sma:
K10vimkn_u:438: gaccha tvaṃ maudgalyāyana vimalakīrter licchaver glānaparipṛcchakaḥ /
K10vimkn_u:440: nāhaṃ bhagavan utsahe tasya satpuruṣasya glānaparipṛcchako gantum /
K10vimkn_u:443: ekasmin samaye vaiśālyāṃ mahānagaryām anyatamasmin vīthīmukhe gṛhapatibhyo dharmaṃ deśayāmi /
K10vimkn_u:444: tatra māṃ vimalakīrtir licchavir upasaṃkrāmyaivam āha:
K10vimkn_u:445: Vkn 3.6 na bhadantamaudgalyāyana gṛhibhyo 'vadātavasanebhya evaṃ dharmo deśayitavyo yathā bhadanto deśayati /
K10vimkn_u:446: api tu tathā bhadantamaudgalyāyana dharmo deśayitavyo yathaiva sa dharmaḥ /
K10vimkn_u:474: Vkn 3.7 īdṛśasya bhadantamahāmaudgalyāyana dharmasya kīdṛśī deśanā /
K10vimkn_u:477: yatra bhadantamaudgalyāyana asamāropapadaṃ na tatra deśyate na śrūyate na vijñāyate /
K10vimkn_u:479: Vkn 3.8 evaṃ hi cittāvasthānena dharmo deśayitavyaḥ /
K10vimkn_u:481: sudṛṣṭaprajñādarśanena mahākaruṇāmukhībhūtena mahāyānasaṃvarṇakena buddhekṛtajñena śuddhāśayena dharmaniruktividhijñena,
K10vimkn_u:483: Vkn 3.9 tena bhagavan tathā tathā dharmo deśito yathā tato gṛhapatiparsado 'ṣṭānāṃ gṛhapatiśatānām anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittāny utpannāni
K10vimkn_u:485: tan nāhaṃ bhagavan utsahe tasya satpuruṣasya glānaparipṛcchako gantum /
K10vimkn_u:486: Vkn 3.10 tatra bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ mahākāśyapam āmantrayate sma:
K10vimkn_u:487: gaccha tvaṃ mahākāśyapa vimalakīrter licchaver glānaparipṛcchakaḥ /
K10vimkn_u:489: nāhaṃ bhagavan utsahe tasya satpuruṣasya glānaparipṛcchako gantum /
K10vimkn_u:491: abhijānāmy ahaṃ bhagavan daridravīthyāṃ piṇḍāya carāmi /
K10vimkn_u:492: tatra māṃ vimalakirtir licchavir upasaṃkramyaivam āha:
K10vimkn_u:495: api tu bhadantamahākāśyapa dharmasamatāpratiṣṭhitena te bhavitavyam /
K10vimkn_u:511: Vkn 3.13 yadi sthaviro mahākāśyapo 'ṣṭau ca mithyātvāni samatikrāmet,
K10vimkn_u:515: sarvabuddhān sarvāryāṃś ca pratipādya paścād ātmanā paribhuñjīta,
K10vimkn_u:516: tathā ca paribhuñjīta yathā na saṃkleśo na vigatakleśaḥ,
K10vimkn_u:519: ye ca bhadantāya piṇḍapātaṃ dadati te teṣāṃ nālpaphalaṃ na mahāphalaiḥ bhavet /
K10vimkn_u:520: na ca hānāya na viśeṣāya gacchet,
K10vimkn_u:523: Vkn 3.14 so 'haṃ bhagavan imaṃ dharmanirdeśaṃ śrutvāścaryaprāptaḥ sarvabodhisatvān namasyāmi /
K10vimkn_u:526: tataḥ prabhṛti me na kaścit satvaḥ śrāvakayāne pratyekabuddhayāne vā samādāpitapūrvo 'nyatra mahāyānāt /
K10vimkn_u:527: tan nāhaṃ bhagavan utsahe tasya kulaputrasya glānaparipṛcchako gantum /
K10vimkn_u:528: Vkn 3.15 tatra bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim āmantrayate sma:
K10vimkn_u:529: gaccha tvaṃ subhūte vimalakīrter licchaver glānaparipṛcchakaḥ /
K10vimkn_u:531: nāhaṃ bhagavan utsahe tasya satpuruṣasya glānaparipṛcchako gantum /
K10vimkn_u:534: ekasmin samaye vaiśālyāṃ mahānagaryāṃ piṇḍāya carāmi /
K10vimkn_u:536: tasya me vimalakīrtir licchaviḥ pātraṃ gṛhītvā praṇītena bhojanena pratipūryaivam āha:
K10vimkn_u:537: Vkn 3.16 sacet tvaṃ bhadantasubhūte āmiṣasamatayā sarvadharmasamatām anugataḥ sarvadharmasamatayā ca buddhadharmasamatām anugata eva,
K10vimkn_u:539: sacet tvaṃ bhadantasubhūte na rāgadoṣamohaprahīṇo na ca taiḥ sārdhaṃ saṃvasasi /
K10vimkn_u:540: saced evam asy avikopya satkāyam ekāyanaṃ mārgam anugataḥ /
K10vimkn_u:541: na ca te 'vidyā bhavatṛṣṇā ca samudghātitā na ca vidyāvimuktī utpādite /
K10vimkn_u:544: na ca te catvāry āryasatyāni dṛṣṭāni na ca na dṛṣṭasatyaḥ /
K10vimkn_u:548: Vkn 3.17 na ca te śāstā dṛṣṭo na dharmaḥ śruto na saṃghaḥ paryupāsitaḥ /
K10vimkn_u:549: ye ca te ṣaṭ śāstāras tadyathā pūraṇaḥ kāśyapaḥ,
K10vimkn_u:555: te ca bhadantasya śāstāras tāṃś ca niśritya pravrajito yadgāminas te ṣaṭ śāstāras tadgāmy evāryasubhūtiḥ,
K10vimkn_u:556: Vkn 3.18 sarvadṛṣṭigateṣu cāryaman antargato na cāntamadhyaprāptaḥ,
K10vimkn_u:557: aṣṭākṣaṇasamavasaraṇaś cāsi na cāsi lakṣaṇam anuprāptaḥ,
K10vimkn_u:559: yā ca sarvasatvānām araṇā sā bhadantasyāpy araṇā,
K10vimkn_u:561: ye ca bhadantāya piṇḍapātaṃ dadati tāṃś ca vinipātayasi,
K10vimkn_u:562: sarvamāraiś ca te sārdham ekahastaḥ kṛtaḥ /
K10vimkn_u:571: Vkn 3.19 tasya me bhagavan imaṃ dharmanirdeśaṃ śrutvāndhakāraprāptā diśo 'bhūvan ḥ tat kim asmai nirdiśāmi,
K10vimkn_u:573: so 'haṃ tat pātram utsṛjya tato gṛhān niṣkramiṣyāmīti /
K10vimkn_u:578: yadi tathāgatanirmita evam ucyeta kaccit sa uttraset /
K10vimkn_u:585: evaṃ paṇḍitā akṣareṣu na sajjanti na tebhya uttrasyanti /
K10vimkn_u:587: sarvāṇi tāny akṣarāṇy anakṣarāṇi sthāpayitvā vimuktiṃ vimuktilakṣaṇāṃś ca sarvadharmān /
K10vimkn_u:588: Vkn 3.20 iha nirdeśe nirdiśyamāne dvayor devaputraśatayor virajo vigatamalaṃ dharmeṣu dharmacakṣur viśuddham,
K10vimkn_u:589: pañcānāṃ ca devaputraśatānām ānulomikyāḥ kṣānteḥ pratilambho 'bhūt /
K10vimkn_u:591: na cāsya śaknomy uttare prativacanaṃ dātum /
K10vimkn_u:592: tan nāham utsahe tasya satpuruṣasya glānaparipṛcchako gantum /
K10vimkn_u:593: Vkn 3.21 atha khalu bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ pūrṇaṃ maitrāyaṇīputram āmantrayate sma:
K10vimkn_u:594: gaccha tvaṃ pūrṇa vimalakīrter licchaver glānaparipṛcchakaḥ /
K10vimkn_u:596: nāhaṃ bhagavan utsahe tasya satpuruṣasya glānaparipṛcchako gantum /
K10vimkn_u:599: ekasmin samaye vanasyānyatamasmin pṛthivīpradeśa ādikarmikāṇāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ dharmaṃ deśayāmi /
K10vimkn_u:600: tatra vimalakīrtir licchavir upasaṃkramya mām evam āha:
K10vimkn_u:601: Vkn 3.22 samāpadya bhadantapūrṇa eteṣāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ cittaṃ vyavalokya dharmaṃ deśaya /
K10vimkn_u:603: jāniṣva tāvat kimāśayā ete bhikṣava iti /
K10vimkn_u:605: mā bhadantapūrṇa apratyavekṣyā satvendriyeṣu prādeśikendriyatvam upasaṃhārṣīḥ /
K10vimkn_u:611: api bhadantapūrṇa sarve hy ete bhikṣavo mahāyānasaṃprasthitā amuṣitabodhicittāḥ /
K10vimkn_u:614: jātyandhā iva me śrāvakāḥ pratibhānti satvendriyavimātratājñāne /
K10vimkn_u:615: Vkn 3.23 atha vimalakīrtir licchavis tasyāṃ velāyāṃ tathārūpaṃ samādhiṃ samāpadyate sma /
K10vimkn_u:616: yathā te bhikṣavo 'nekavidhaṃ pūrvenivāsam anusmaraṇti sma /
K10vimkn_u:619: te tasya satpuruṣasya pādau śirobhiḥ praṇamya tatraiva niṣaṇṇāḥ prāñjalayo bhūtvā,
K10vimkn_u:620: teṣāṃ tādṛśī dharmadeśanā kṛtā yathāvaivartikāḥ saṃvṛttā anuttarasyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
K10vimkn_u:621: Vkn 3.24 tan nāhaṃ bhagavan utsahe tasya satpuruṣasya glānaparipṛcchako gantum /
K10vimkn_u:622: Vkn 3.25 tatra bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ kātyāyanam āmantrayate sma:
K10vimkn_u:623: gaccha tvaṃ kātyāyana vimalakīrter licchaver glānaparipṛcchakaḥ /
K10vimkn_u:625: nāhaṃ bhagavan utsahe tasya satpuruṣasya glānaparipṛcchako gantum /
K10vimkn_u:630: yad idam anityārthaṃ duḥkhārtham anātmārthaṃ śāntārtham /
K10vimkn_u:631: tatra vimalakīrtir licchavir upasaṃkramya mām evam āha:
K10vimkn_u:632: Vkn 3.26 mā bhadantakātyāyana sapracārām utpādabhaṅgayuktāṃ dharmatāṃ nirdiśa /
K10vimkn_u:633: yo bhadantamahākātyāyana atyantatayā na jāto na janiṣyati notpanno na niruddho na nirotsyate 'yam anityārthaḥ /
K10vimkn_u:639: Vkn 3.27 asmin khalu punar nirdeśe nirdiśyamāne teṣāṃ bhikṣūṇām anupādāyāsravebhyaś cittāni vimuktāni /
K10vimkn_u:640: tan nāhaṃ bhagavan utsahe tasya satpuruṣasya glānaparipṛcchako gantum /
K10vimkn_u:641: Vkn 3.28 tatra bhagavān āyuṣmantam aniruddham āmantrayate sma:
K10vimkn_u:642: gaccha tvam aniruddha vimalakīrter licchaver glānaparipṛcchakaḥ /
K10vimkn_u:644: nāhaṃ bhagavan utsahe tasya satpuruṣasya glānaparipṛcchako gantum /
K10vimkn_u:648: tatra śubhavyūho nāma brahmā daśabhir brahmasahasraiḥ sārdhaṃ taṃ pradeśam avabhāsya yenāhaṃ tenopasaṃkramya mama pādau śirasābhivandyaikānte sthitvā mām etad avocat:
K10vimkn_u:649: kiyad āyuṣmān aniruddho divyena cakṣuṣā paśyati /
K10vimkn_u:651: ahaṃ mārṣa imaṃ triṃ sāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātuṃ bhagavataḥ śākyamuner buddhakṣetraṃ tad yathāpi nāma karatale nyastam āmalakaphalam evaṃ paśyāmi /
K10vimkn_u:652: Vkn 3.30 iyaṃ ca kathā pravṛttā vimalakīrtiś ca licchavis taṃ pradeśam upasaṃkrāmat /
K10vimkn_u:653: upasaṃkramya mama pādau śirasā vanditvaivam āha:
K10vimkn_u:654: kiṃ bhadantāniruddha divyaṃ cakṣur abhisaṃskāralakṣaṇam utānabhisaṃskāralakṣaṇam /
K10vimkn_u:655: yady abhisaṃskāralakṣaṇaṃ tad bāhyaiḥ pañcābhijñaiḥ samam,
K10vimkn_u:656: athānabhisaṃskāralakṣaṇaṃ anabhisaṃskāro 'saṃskṛtas tena na śakyaṃ draṣṭum /
K10vimkn_u:659: Vkn 3.31 sa ca brahmā tasya satpuruṣasyemaṃ nirdeśaṃ śrutvāścaryaprāptas taṃ namaskṛtyaitad avocat:
K10vimkn_u:661: āha: buddhā bhagavanto loke divyacakṣuṣo ye samāhitāvasthāṃ ca na vijahati sarvabuddhakṣetrāṇi ca paśyanti /
K10vimkn_u:663: Vkn 3.32 atha sa brahmemaṃ nirdeśaṃ śrutvā daśasahasraparivāro 'dhyāśayenānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittam utpādayati sma /
K10vimkn_u:664: sa māṃ vanditvā taṃ ca satpuruṣam abhivādya tatraivāntarhitaḥ /
K10vimkn_u:666: tan nāham utsahe tasya satpuruṣasya glānaparipṛcchako gantum /
K10vimkn_u:667: Vkn 3.33 tatra bhagavān āyuṣmantam upālim āmantrayate sma:
K10vimkn_u:668: gaccha tvam upāle vimalakīrter licchaver glānaparipṛcchakaḥ /
K10vimkn_u:670: nāhaṃ bhagavan utsahe tasya satpuruṣasya glānaparipṛcchako gantum /
K10vimkn_u:675: tau yenāhaṃ tenopasaṃkrāntāv upasaṃkrāmya mām etad avocatām /
K10vimkn_u:677: tāv āvāṃ paryapatrapamāṇau bhagavantam upasaṃkramituṃ notsahāvahe /
K10vimkn_u:678: utsāhāya āyuṣmann upāle vinodayasvāvayoḥ kaukṛtyaṃ vyutthāpayasvāvām āpatteḥ /
K10vimkn_u:679: Vkn 3.34 so 'haṃ bhagavaṃs tau bhikṣū dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśayāmi /
K10vimkn_u:680: vimalakīrtiś ca licchavis taṃ pradeśam anuprāptaḥ sa mām etad avocat:
K10vimkn_u:684: na hi bhadantopāle āpattir adhyātmapratiṣṭhitā na bahirdhāsaṃkrānto nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate /
K10vimkn_u:686: uktaṃ hi bhagavatā cittasaṃkleśāt satvāḥ saṃkliśyante cittavyavadānād viśudhyante /
K10vimkn_u:687: cittaṃ ca bhadantopāle nādhyātmapratiṣṭhitaṃ na bahirdhā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate /
K10vimkn_u:691: yā bhadantopāle cittasya prakṛtir yayā cittaprakṛtyā bhadantasya cittaṃ vimuktam,
K10vimkn_u:705: ye tv evaṃ jānanti te vinayadharā ity ucyante /
K10vimkn_u:707: Vkn 3.36 atha tau bhikṣu etad avocatām:
K10vimkn_u:709: na tv ayaṃ bhadantopālir yo bhagavatā vinayadharāṇām agro nirdiṣṭaḥ /
K10vimkn_u:713: tathāgataṃ sthāpayitvā nāsti kaścic chrāvako vā bodhisatvo vā,
K10vimkn_u:716: Vkn 3.37 atha tau bhikṣū vinītakaukṛtyāv adhyāśayena tatraivānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittam utpāditavantau,
K10vimkn_u:719: tan nāham utsahe tasya satpuruṣasya glānaparipṛcchako gantum /
K10vimkn_u:720: Vkn 3.38 tatra bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ rāhulam āmantrayate sma:
K10vimkn_u:721: gaccha tvaṃ rāhula vimalakīrter licchaver glānaparipṛcchakaḥ /
K10vimkn_u:723: nāhaṃ bhagavan utsahe tasya satpuruṣasya glānaparipṛcchako gantum /
K10vimkn_u:726: ekasmin samaye saṃbahulā licchavikumārakā yenāhaṃ tenopasaṃkramya mām etad avocan:
K10vimkn_u:727: tvaṃ rāhula tasya bhagavataḥ putraś cakravartirājyam utsṛjya pravrajitaḥ,
K10vimkn_u:729: teṣām ahaṃ yathārūpaṃ pravrajyāyā guṇānuśaṃsā nirdiśāmi,
K10vimkn_u:732: Vkn 3.39 na bhadantarāhula evaṃ pravrajyāyā guṇānuśaṃsā nirdeṣṭavyā yathā tvaṃ nirdiśasi /
K10vimkn_u:762: Vkn 3.40 pravrajata yūyaṃ kumārakāḥ svākhyāte dharmavinaye /
K10vimkn_u:769: sa tān āha: utpādayata yūyaṃ kumārakāḥ anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittam /
K10vimkn_u:772: Vkn 3.41 tatra dvātriṃśatā licchavikumārair anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittāny utpāditāni /
K10vimkn_u:773: tan nāhaṃ bhagavan utsahe tasya satpuruṣasya glānaparipṛcchako gantum /
K10vimkn_u:774: Vkn 3.42 tatra bhagavān āyuṣmantam ānandam āmantrayate sma:
K10vimkn_u:775: gaccha tvam ānanda vimalakīrter licchaver glānaparipṛcchakaḥ /
K10vimkn_u:776: ānanda āha: nāhaṃ bhagavan utsahe tasya satpuruṣasya glānaparipṛcchako gantum /
K10vimkn_u:779: ekasmin samaye bhagavataḥ kāyasya kaścid evābādhaḥ /
K10vimkn_u:781: so 'ham anyatamasmin brāhmaṇamahāśālasya gṛhamūle pātraṃ gṛhītvā sthitaḥ /
K10vimkn_u:784: Vkn 3.43 kiṃ bhadantānanda kālyam eva pātram ādāyāsmin gṛhadvārasamīpe tiṣṭhasi /
K10vimkn_u:791: vajrasaṃhatano hi bhadantānanda tathāgatakāyaḥ sarvākuśalavāsanāprahīṇaḥ sarvamahaujaskakuśaladharmasamanvāgataḥ /
K10vimkn_u:796: mā mahaujaskā devaputrā anyabuddhakṣetrasaṃnipatitāś ca bodhisatvāḥ śroṣyanti /
K10vimkn_u:797: rājñas tāvad bhadantānanda cakravartina itvarakuśalamūlasamanvāgatasya vyādhir na saṃvidyate /
K10vimkn_u:804: kīdṛśo bata ayam eṣāṃ śāstā yaḥ svayam eva tāvad ātmānaṃ glānaṃ na śaknoti paritrātum,
K10vimkn_u:805: kutaḥ punar glānānāṃ satvānāṃ trāṇaṃ bhaviṣyati /
K10vimkn_u:808: Vkn 3.45 api tu bhadantānanda dharmakāyās tathāgatā nāmiṣakāyāḥ /
K10vimkn_u:812: tasya bhadanto vyādhim icchatīty ayuktam asadṛśam /
K10vimkn_u:813: Vkn 3.46 tasya me bhagavan mahadapatrāpyaṃ jātam /
K10vimkn_u:814: mā me bhagavato 'ntikād duḥśrutaṃ durgṛhītaṃ vā kṛtam iti /
K10vimkn_u:816: evam etad ānanda yathā gṛhapatir nirdiśati /
K10vimkn_u:817: atha ca punaḥ pañcakaṣāye bhagavān utpannaḥ,
K10vimkn_u:819: tad gaccha tvam ānanda kṣīraṃ gṛhītvā,
K10vimkn_u:821: Vkn 3.47 īdṛśā bhagavan vimalakīrter licchaveḥ praśnavyākaraṇanirdeśāḥ /
K10vimkn_u:822: tan nāhaṃ bhagavan utsahe tasya kulaputrasya glānaparipṛcchako gantum /
K10vimkn_u:823: Vkn 3.48 evaṃ tāni pañcamātrāṇi śrāvakaśatāny anutsahamānāni bhagavate nivedayanti /
K10vimkn_u:824: ye ca tair vimalakīrtinā licchavinā sārdhaṃ kathāsaṃlāpāḥ kṛtās tān sarvān bhagavate nivedayanti sma /
K10vimkn_u:825: Vkn 3.49 tatra bhagavān maitreyaṃ bodhisatvam āmantrayate sma:
K10vimkn_u:826: gaccha tvaṃ maitreya vimalakīrter licchaver glānaparipṛcchakaḥ /
K10vimkn_u:828: nāhaṃ bhagavan utsahe tasya satpuruṣasya glānaparipṛcchako gantum /
K10vimkn_u:831: ekasmin samaye saṃtuṣitena devaputreṇa sārdhaṃ tuṣitakāyikaiś ca devaputraiḥ sārdhaṃ dharmyāṃ kathāṃ kathayāmi yad idaṃ bodhisatvānāṃ mahāsatvānām avivartyāṃ bhūmim ārabhya /
K10vimkn_u:832: tatra ca vimalakīrtir licchavis taṃ pradeśam upasaṃkrāntaḥ /
K10vimkn_u:834: Vkn 3.50 tvaṃ maitreya ekajātipratibaddho bhagavatā vyākṛto 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
K10vimkn_u:841: tathā hi tvaṃ bhikṣaḥ kṣaṇe kṣaṇe jāyase jīryasi mriyase cyavase upapadyase ceti /
K10vimkn_u:845: Vkn 3.51 tat kathaṃ tvaṃ maitreya vyākṛtas tathatotpādena tathatānirodhena vā /
K10vimkn_u:851: evaṃ yadi tvaṃ vyākṛtaḥ sarvasatvā api vyākṛtā bhavanti /
K10vimkn_u:855: sarvasatvā api tasmin samaye tādṛśīm eva bodhim abhisaṃbhotsyante /
K10vimkn_u:861: na hy aparinirvṛtānāṃ sarvasatvānāṃ tathāgatāḥ parinirvānti /
K10vimkn_u:863: tasmād iha maitreya mā etān devaputrān ullāpaya mā visaṃvādaya /
K10vimkn_u:866: api tu khalu punar maitreya yaiṣāṃ devaputrāṇāṃ bodhiparikalpanadṛṣṭis tām etām utsarjaya /
K10vimkn_u:867: na hi bodhiḥ kāyenābhisaṃbudhyate, na cittena /
K10vimkn_u:885: na deśasthā na pradeśasthā bodhiḥ sthānāsthānavigatā,
K10vimkn_u:887: nāmadheyamātraṃ bodhis tac ca nāma nirīhakam,
K10vimkn_u:896: sā na śakyā kāyena vācā cittenābhisaṃboddhum /
K10vimkn_u:897: Vkn 3.53 iha bhagavan nirdeśe nirdiśyamāne tataḥ pariṣado dvayor devaputraśatayor anutpattikeṣu dharmeṣu kṣāntipratilambho 'bhūt /
K10vimkn_u:899: tan nāhaṃ bhagavan utsahe tasya satpuruṣasya glānaparipṛcchako gantum /
K10vimkn_u:900: Vkn 3.54 tatra bhagavān prabhāvyūhaṃ licchavikumāram āmantrayate sma:
K10vimkn_u:901: gaccha tvaṃ satpuruṣa vimalakīrter licchaver glānaparipṛcchakaḥ /
K10vimkn_u:903: nāhaṃ bhagavan utsahe tasya satpuruṣasya glānaparipṛcchako gantum /
K10vimkn_u:906: ekasmin samaye bhagavan vaiśālyā mahānagaryā niṣkramāmi /
K10vimkn_u:915: Vkn 3.55 bodhimaṇḍa iti kulaputra āśayamaṇḍa eṣo 'kṛtrimatayā,
K10vimkn_u:947: Vkn 3.60 iti hi kulaputra yāvanto bodhisatvāḥ pāramitāpratisaṃyuktaṃ satvaparipākapratisaṃyuktaṃ
K10vimkn_u:948: saddharmaparigrahapratisaṃyuktaṃ kuśalamūlapratisaṃyuktaṃ kramam utkṣipanti nikṣipanti ca /
K10vimkn_u:952: Vkn 3.61 iha bhagavan nirdeśe nirdiśyamāne pañcamātrair devamanuṣyaśatair bodhāya cittāny utpāditāni /
K10vimkn_u:954: tan nāhaṃ bhagavan utsahe tasya satpuruṣasya glānaparipṛcchako gantum /
K10vimkn_u:955: Vkn 3.62 tatra bhagavān jagatindharaṃ bodhisatvam āmantrayate sma:
K10vimkn_u:956: gaccha tvaṃ jagatindhara vimalakīrter licchaver glānaparipṛcchakaḥ /
K10vimkn_u:958: nāhaṃ bhagavan utsahe tasya satpuruṣasya glānaparipṛcchako gantum /
K10vimkn_u:962: atha māraḥ pāpīyān dvādaśabhir apsaraḥsahasraiḥ parivṛtaḥ śakraveṣeṇa tūryasaṃgītisaṃpravāditena
K10vimkn_u:963: yenāhaṃ tenopasaṃkramya mama pādau śirasā vanditvā saparivāro māṃ puraskṛtyaikānte 'sthāt /
K10vimkn_u:964: tam enam ahaṃ jānāmi ḥ śakra eṣa devendra iti /
K10vimkn_u:970: pratīccha tvaṃ satpuruṣa imāni dvādaśāpsaraḥsahasrāṇi mamāntikāt,
K10vimkn_u:973: mā tvaṃ kauṣika akalpikena vastunā śramaṇān śākyaputrīyān nimantraya,
K10vimkn_u:974: yathā na hy etā asmākaṃ kalpyanta iti /
K10vimkn_u:979: māra eṣa pāpīyāṃs tava viheṭhanābhiprāya upasaṃkrāntaḥ,
K10vimkn_u:981: atha vimalakīrtir licchavis taṃ māraṃ pāpīyāṃsam etad avocat:
K10vimkn_u:985: atha māraḥ pāpīyān bhītas trastaḥ saṃvignaḥ /
K10vimkn_u:988: na ca śaknoti sarvarddhim api darśayitvāntardhātum /
K10vimkn_u:990: niryātaya tvam etāḥ pāpīyan apsarasa etasmai satpuruṣāya,
K10vimkn_u:992: atha māro bhītas trasto 'kāmako 'smai tā apsaraso niryātayati /
K10vimkn_u:993: Vkn 3.64 pratigṛhya ca vimalakīrtis tā apsarasa etad avocat:
K10vimkn_u:996: sa tāsāṃ tadānulomikīṃ bodhiparipācanīṃ kathāṃ kṛtvā bodhau cittam utpādayati sma /
K10vimkn_u:1037: Vkn 3.65 atha māraḥ pāpīyāṃs tā apsarasa etad avocat: āgacchata /
K10vimkn_u:1040: niryātitā idānīṃ tvayā vayam asmai gṛhapataye /
K10vimkn_u:1043: atha māraḥ pāpīyān vimalakīrtiṃ licchavim evam āha:
K10vimkn_u:1050: atha tā apsaraso vimalakīrtiṃ namaskṛtyaivam āhuḥ:
K10vimkn_u:1052: Vkn 3.66 āha: asti bhaginyaḥ akṣayapradīpaṃ nāma dharmamukham /
K10vimkn_u:1055: tadyathā bhaginyaḥ ekasmāt tailapradīpād dīpaśatasahasrāṇy ādīpyante /
K10vimkn_u:1056: na ca tasya dīpasya parihāṇir bhavati /
K10vimkn_u:1057: evam eva bhaginyaḥ eko bodhisatvo bahūni satvaśatasahasrāṇi bodhau pratiṣṭhāpayati /
K10vimkn_u:1058: na ca tasya bodhisatvasya cittasmṛtir hīyate,
K10vimkn_u:1061: evaṃ sarvān kuśalān dharmān yathā yathā pareṣām ārocayati deśayati,
K10vimkn_u:1062: tathā tathā vivardhate sarvaiḥ kuśalair dharmaiḥ /
K10vimkn_u:1064: tatra yuṣmābhir mārabhavane sthitābhir aparimāṇānāṃ devaputrāṇām apsarasāṃ ca bodhicittaṃ rocayitavyam /
K10vimkn_u:1067: Vkn 3.67 atha tā apsaraso vimalakīrter licchaveḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā sārdhaṃ māreṇa prakrāntāḥ /
K10vimkn_u:1070: tan nāhaṃ bhagavan utsahe tasya satpuruṣasya glānaparipṛcchako gantum /
K10vimkn_u:1071: Vkn 3.68 tatra bhagavān sudattaṃ śreṣṭhiputram āmantrayate sma:
K10vimkn_u:1072: gaccha tvaṃ kulaputra vimalakīrter licchaver glānaparipṛcchakaḥ /
K10vimkn_u:1074: nāhaṃ bhagavan utsahe tasya satpuruṣasya glānaparipṛcchako gantum /
K10vimkn_u:1080: tatra saptame divase vimalakīrtir licchavis tāṃ mahāyajñaśālāṃ praviśya mām etad avocat:
K10vimkn_u:1081: na śreṣṭhiputra evaṃ yajño yaṣṭavyo yathā tvaṃ yajase /
K10vimkn_u:1124: yatra dharmayajñe pratiṣṭhitā bodhisatvā iṣṭayajñayājūkā dakṣiṇīyā bhavanti sadevakasya lokasya /
K10vimkn_u:1125: evaṃ hi bhagavan tasya gṛhapater nirdiśatas tasyā brāhmaṇaparṣado dvayor brāhmaṇaśatayor anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittāny utpannāni /
K10vimkn_u:1126: Vkn 3.75 ahaṃ cāścaryaprasādapratilabdhas tasya satpuruṣasya caraṇau praṇamya śatasahasramūlyaṃ muktāhāraṃ kaṇṭhād avatārya dadāmi /
K10vimkn_u:1127: sa taiḥ muktāhāraṃ na pratigṛhṇāti sma /
K10vimkn_u:1130: yatra te prasādo bhavati tasmai prayaccheti /
K10vimkn_u:1132: eko bhāgo yas tatra yajñaśālāyāṃ sarvalokajugupsito nagaradaridras tasmai dattaḥ /
K10vimkn_u:1133: dvitīyaś ca bhāgo duṣprasahāya tathāgatāya dattaḥ /
K10vimkn_u:1134: yathā ca sarvā parṣat paśyati taṃ ca marīciṃ lokadhātuṃ taṃ ca duṣprasahaṃ tathāgataṃ
K10vimkn_u:1135: taṃ ca muktāhāraṃ duṣprasahasya mūrdhasaṃdhau muktāhārakūṭāgāraṃ prādurbhūtaṃ citraṃ
K10vimkn_u:1137: Vkn 3.76 sa idaṃ prātihāryaṃ saṃdarśyemāṃ vācam abhāṣata:
K10vimkn_u:1138: yasya dāyakasya dānapater yādṛśī tathāgate dakṣiṇīyasaṃjñā tādṛśī nagaradaridre nirnānātvena samā,
K10vimkn_u:1141: Vkn 3.77 tatrāsau nagaradaridra idaṃ prātihāryaṃ dṛṣṭvā,
K10vimkn_u:1144: tan nāhaṃ bhagavan utsahe tasya satpuruṣasya glānaparipṛcchako gantum /
K10vimkn_u:1145: Vkn 3.78 iti hi sarve te bodhisatvā mahāsatvāḥ svakasvakān nirdeśān nirdiśanti sma,
K10vimkn_u:1146: ye caiṣāṃ tena satpuruṣeṇa sārdham antarākathāsamudāhārā abhūvan,
K10vimkn_u:1149: Vkn 4.1 tatra bhagavān mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtam āmantrayate sma:
K10vimkn_u:1150: gaccha tvaṃ mañjuśrīḥ vimalakīrter licchaver glānaparipṛcchakaḥ /
K10vimkn_u:1152: kiṃ cāpi durāsado 'sau bhagavan vimalakīrtir licchaviḥ,
K10vimkn_u:1168: Vkn 4.2 atha tataḥ parṣadas teṣāṃ bodhisatvānāṃ teṣāṃ ca śrāvakāṇāṃ teṣāṃ ca śakrabrahmalokapālānāṃ teṣāṃ ca devaputrāṇām etad abhavat:
K10vimkn_u:1170: yatra mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūtaḥ sa ca satpuruṣa ubhau saṃlapiṣyataḥ /
K10vimkn_u:1171: tatrāṣṭau ca bodhisatvasahasrāṇi pañcamātrāṇi ca śrāvakaśatāni saṃbahulāś ca śakrabrahmalokapālāḥ saṃbahulāni ca devaputraśatasahasrāṇi mañjuśriyam anubaddhāni dharmaśravaṇāya /
K10vimkn_u:1172: atha mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūtas tair bodhisatvair mahāsatvais taiś ca śrāvakais taiś ca śakrabrahmalokapālair devaputraiś ca parivṛto vaiśālīṃ mahānagarīṃ praviśati sma /
K10vimkn_u:1174: ayaṃ mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūta āgacchati mahatā parivāreṇa /
K10vimkn_u:1175: yan nv ahaṃ śūnyaṃ gṛham adhitiṣṭheyam /
K10vimkn_u:1176: tena taṃ gṛhaṃ śūnyam adhiṣṭhitam apagatadvārapālam /
K10vimkn_u:1177: na tatra mañcā vā pīṭhā vāsanāni vā saṃdṛśyante 'nyatraikasmān mañcāt,
K10vimkn_u:1179: Vkn 4.4 atha mañjuśrīḥ saparivāro yena vimalakīrter niveśanaṃ tenopasaṃkrāmat /
K10vimkn_u:1181: sa taṃ gṛhaṃ śūnyam apaśyad vigatadvārapālam /
K10vimkn_u:1182: na cātra mañcān vā pīṭhān vāpaśyad anyatraikamañcāt,
K10vimkn_u:1184: atha vimalakīrtir licchavir mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtam adrākṣīt /
K10vimkn_u:1189: ya āgato na sa bhūya āgamiṣyati /
K10vimkn_u:1190: yaś ca gato na sa bhūyo gamiṣyati /
K10vimkn_u:1194: yaś ca dṛṣṭo na bhūyo draṣṭavyaḥ /
K10vimkn_u:1195: Vkn 4.5 api tu kaccit te satpuruṣa kṣapaṇīyam,
K10vimkn_u:1200: alpātaṅkatāṃ cālpaglānyatāṃ ca laghūtthānatāṃ ca yatrāṃ ca balaṃ ca sukhaṃ cānavadyatāṃ ca sparśavihāratāṃ ca /
K10vimkn_u:1201: Vkn 4.6 kutra te gṛhapate idaṃ vyādhisamutthānam /
K10vimkn_u:1205: yāvacciram upādāya mañjuśrīḥ avidyā bhavatṛṣṇā ca tāvacciram upādāya mamaiṣa vyādhiḥ /
K10vimkn_u:1206: yadā ca sarvasatvā vigatavyādhayo bhaviṣyanti tadā mama vyādhiḥ praśrabdho bhaviṣyati /
K10vimkn_u:1210: yadā sarvasatvā vigatavyādhayo bhaviṣyanti tadā bodhisatvo 'rogo bhaviṣyati /
K10vimkn_u:1211: Vkn 4.7 tadyathā mañjuśrīḥ śreṣṭhina ekaputrako glāno bhavet /
K10vimkn_u:1213: tāvac ca duḥkhitau bhavetāṃ yāvan nāsāv ekaputrakas tayor vigatavyādhiḥ syāt /
K10vimkn_u:1217: yat punar mañjuśriḥ evaṃ vadasi ḥ kutaḥ samutthito vyādhir iti,
K10vimkn_u:1228: āha: yenāpi parikalpyeta tad api śūnyam /
K10vimkn_u:1231: āha: śūnyatā mañjuśrīḥ dvāṣaṣṭibhyo dṛṣṭigatebhyo mārgitavyā /
K10vimkn_u:1232: āha: dvāṣaṣṭiḥ punar dṛṣṭigatāni kuto mārgitavyāni /
K10vimkn_u:1236: yat punar mañjuśrīḥ evaṃ vadasi ḥ kas ta upasthāyaka iti /
K10vimkn_u:1247: āha: kim eṣa vyādhiḥ kāyasaṃprayukta uta cittasaṃprayuktaḥ /
K10vimkn_u:1252: yad uta pṛthivīdhātur abdhātus tejodhātur vāyudhātur iti /
K10vimkn_u:1254: āha: ya evaṃ dhātuko mañjuśrīḥ sarvasatvānāṃ vyādhis tenāhaṃ vyādhitaḥ /
K10vimkn_u:1255: Vkn 4.10 api tu khalu punar mañjuśrīḥ kathaṃ bodhisatvena glānako bodhisatvaḥ pratisaṃmoditavyaḥ /
K10vimkn_u:1272: kathaṃ kulaputra bodhisatvena glānena svacittaṃ nidhyapayitavyam /
K10vimkn_u:1274: iha mañjuśrīḥ bodhisatvena glānenaivaṃ svacittaṃ nidhyapayitavyam /
K10vimkn_u:1276: na punar atra kaścit paramārthato dharma upalabhyate yasyaiṣa vyādhiḥ /
K10vimkn_u:1279: na caiṣāṃ dhātūnāṃ kaścit svāmī na samutthāpayitā /
K10vimkn_u:1281: yo 'yaṃ vyādhir nāma nāyaṃ paramārthata upalabhyate,
K10vimkn_u:1288: te ca dharmāḥ parasparaṃ na cetayanti na jānanti /
K10vimkn_u:1289: na ca teṣām utpadyamānānām evaṃ bhavaty utpadyāmaha iti /
K10vimkn_u:1290: na nirudhyamānānām evaṃ bhavati nirudhyāmaha iti /
K10vimkn_u:1291: Vkn 4.12 tena dharmasaṃjñāyā evaṃ cittam utpādayitavyam /
K10vimkn_u:1301: yad idam adhyātmaṃ bahirdhā ca samudācāraḥ /
K10vimkn_u:1313: tena samadarśinā nānyo vyādhir nānyā śūnyatā kartavyā /
K10vimkn_u:1315: Vkn 4.13 aviditā ca sā vedanā veditavyā /
K10vimkn_u:1318: na ca durgatyupapannānāṃ satvānām antike mahākaruṇā notpādayitavyā /
K10vimkn_u:1319: tathā kariṣyāmo yathaiṣāṃ satvānām evam ayoniśonidhyaptyā vyādhim apaneṣyāmaḥ /
K10vimkn_u:1320: Vkn 4.14 na caiṣāṃ kaṃcid dharmam upaneṣyāmo nāpaneṣyāmaḥ /
K10vimkn_u:1321: yato nidānāc ca punar vyādhir utpadyate tasya parijñāyai tebhyo dharmaṃ deśayiṣyāmaḥ /
K10vimkn_u:1335: evaṃ hi mañjuśrīḥ glānena bodhisatvena svacittaṃ nidhyapayitavyaṃ jarāvyādhimaraṇopapattiprahāṇāya /
K10vimkn_u:1336: evaṃ ca mañjuśrīḥ bodhisatvānāṃ bodhir yadi na bhavet,
K10vimkn_u:1339: evam eva jarāvyādhimaraṇaduḥkhopaśamanād bodhisatvā ity ucyante /
K10vimkn_u:1341: yathā mama vyādhir abhūto 'sann evaṃ sarvasatvānām api vyādhir abhūto 'sann iti /
K10vimkn_u:1345: anuśaṃsadṛṣṭipatitayaiva hi mahākaruṇayā bodhisatvasya khedo bhavaty upapattiṣu /
K10vimkn_u:1346: anuśaṃsadṛṣṭiparyutthānavigatayā punar mahākaruṇayā bodhisatvasya khedo na bhavaty upapattiṣu /
K10vimkn_u:1349: so 'paryutthitacitta upapadyamāno mukta evotpadyate mukta eva jāyate /
K10vimkn_u:1350: sa mukta evotpadyamāno mukta eva jāyamāno baddhānāṃ satvānāṃ śaktaḥ pratibalo bandhamokṣāya dharmaṃ deśayitum /
K10vimkn_u:1351: yathoktaṃ bhagavatā sa tāvad ātmanā baddhaḥ paraṃ bandhanān mocayiṣyatīti nādaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate /
K10vimkn_u:1352: yas tv ātmanā muktaḥ paraṃ bandhanān mocayiṣyatīti sthānam etad vidyate tasmān muktena bodhisatvena bhavitavyam,
K10vimkn_u:1375: yad idaṃ sarvadṛṣṭikleśaparyutthānānuśayānunayapratighaprahīṇasya sarvakuśalamūlārambho bodhau pariṇāmitas tasya cāparāmarśaḥ /
K10vimkn_u:1377: Vkn 4.18 tatra mañjuśrīḥ glānena bodhisatvenaivam ime dharmā nidhyapayitavyāḥ /
K10vimkn_u:1378: yatl kāyasya cittasya ca vyādheś cānityaduḥkhaśūnyānātmapratyavekṣaṇā,
K10vimkn_u:1384: punar aparaṃ yat kāyasya vyādheś cittasya cānyonyaparāparatāṃ na nirnavatāniḥpurāṇatāṃ pratyavekṣate,
K10vimkn_u:1386: yat punaḥ kāyasya vyādheś cittasya ca nātyantopaśamaṃ nirodham atyayati,
K10vimkn_u:1388: Vkn 4.19 evaṃ hi mañjuśriḥ glānena bodhisatvena cittaṃ nidhyapayitavyam /
K10vimkn_u:1389: na ca tena nidhyaptau vānidhyaptau vā sthātavyam /
K10vimkn_u:1391: yadi hy anidhyaptau tiṣṭhed bāladharma eṣaḥ /
K10vimkn_u:1397: yat saṃsāragocaraś ca na ca kleśagocaraḥ,
K10vimkn_u:1403: yat sarvajñajñānaparyeṣṭigocaraś ca na cākāle jñānaprāptigocaraḥ,
K10vimkn_u:1405: yac catuḥsatyajñānagocaraś ca na cākāle satyaprativedhagocaraḥ,
K10vimkn_u:1409: yad ajātipratyavekṣaṇagocaraś ca na ca niyāmāvakrāntigocaraḥ,
K10vimkn_u:1413: yat sarvasatvasaṃgaṇikāgocaraś ca na ca kleśānuśayagocaraḥ,
K10vimkn_u:1415: yad vivekagocaraś ca na ca kāyacittakṣayaniśrayagocaraḥ,
K10vimkn_u:1417: yat traidhātukagocaraś ca na ca dharmadhātusaṃbhedagocaraḥ,
K10vimkn_u:1429: yat ṣaḍanusmṛtigocaraś ca na ca sarvāsravakṣayagocaraḥ,
K10vimkn_u:1431: yat saddharmapratiṣṭhānagocaraś ca na ca kumārgādhyālambanagocaraḥ,
K10vimkn_u:1435: yac caturapramāṇagocaraś ca na ca brahmalokopapattisparśanagocaraḥ,
K10vimkn_u:1437: yad dhyānasamādhisamāpattigocaraś ca na ca samādhisamāpattivaśenopapattigocaraḥ,
K10vimkn_u:1439: yat smṛtyupasthānagocaraś ca na ca kāyavedanācittadharmātyarthagocaraḥ,
K10vimkn_u:1441: yat samyakprahāṇagocaraś ca na ca kuśalākuśaladvayopalambhagocaraḥ,
K10vimkn_u:1465: iha nirdeśe nirdiśyamāne ye mañjuśriyā kumārabhūtena sārdham āgatā devaputrās tato 'ṣṭānāṃ devaputrasahasrāṇām anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittāny utpannāni // //
K10vimkn_u:1471: atha vimalakīrtir licchavir āyuṣmataḥ śāriputrasya cetovitarkam ājñāyāyuṣmantaṃ śāriputram etad avocat:
K10vimkn_u:1474: Vkn 5.2 āha: tena hi bhadantaśāriputra yo dharmarthiko bhavati,
K10vimkn_u:1484: Vkn 5.3 punar aparaṃ bhadantaśāriputra yo dharmārthikaḥ,
K10vimkn_u:1485: nāsau duḥkhaparijñānārthiko na samudayaprahāṇārthiko na nirodhasākṣātkriyārthiko na mārgabhāvanārthiko bhavati /
K10vimkn_u:1488: tatra yaḥ prapañcayati ḥ duḥkhaṃ parijñāsyāmi samudayaṃ prahāsyāmi nirodhaṃ sākṣātkariṣyāmi mārgaṃ bhāvayiṣyāmīti,
K10vimkn_u:1496: tatra ye kvacid dharme rakṣante 'ntaśo nirvāṇe 'pi,
K10vimkn_u:1504: ye kecid dharmaṃ gṛhṇanti vā muñcanti vā,
K10vimkn_u:1527: tasmād iha bhadantaśāriputra dharmārthikena te bhavitukāmena sarvadharmānarthikena bhavitavyam /
K10vimkn_u:1528: iha dharmanirdeśe nirdiśyamāne pañcānāṃ devaputraśatānāṃ dharmeṣu dharmacakṣur viśuddham /
K10vimkn_u:1529: Vkn 5.6 atha vimalakīrtir licchavir mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtam āmantrayate sma:
K10vimkn_u:1530: tvaṃ mañjuśrīḥ daśasu dikṣv asaṃkhyeyeṣu buddhakṣetraśatasahasreṣu buddhakṣetracārikāṃ carasi /
K10vimkn_u:1531: tat katarasmin buddhakṣetre tvayā sarvaviśiṣṭāni sarvaguṇopetāni siṃhāsanāni dṛṣṭāni /
K10vimkn_u:1532: evam ukte mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūto vimalakīrtiṃ licchavim etad avocat:
K10vimkn_u:1533: asti kulaputra pūrve digbhāge ṣaṭtriṃśadgaṅgānadīvālikāsamāni buddhakṣetrāṇy atikramya merudhvajā nāma lokadhātuḥ /
K10vimkn_u:1534: tatra merupradīparājo nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhas tiṣṭhati dhriyate yāpayati /
K10vimkn_u:1539: merudhvajāyāṃ lokadhātau tasya bhagavato merupradīparājasya tathāgatasya buddhakṣetre sarvaviśiṣṭāni sarvagunopetāni siṃhāsanāni /
K10vimkn_u:1540: Vkn 5.7 atha vimalakīrtir licchavis tasyāṃ velāyāṃ tathārūpaṃ samanvāhāraṃ samanvāharati sma /
K10vimkn_u:1542: yat tato merudhvajālokadhātor dvātriṃśatsiṃhāsanaśatasahasrāṇi tena bhagavatā merupradīparājena tathāgatena preṣitāni /
K10vimkn_u:1543: tāvad udviddhāni tāvad vistīrṇāni tāvad darśanīyāni yad apūrvāṇi tair bodhisatvais taiś ca mahāśrāvakais taiś ca śakrabrahmalokapālair devaputraiś ca /
K10vimkn_u:1544: tāny upary antarīkṣeṇāgatya vimalakirter licchaver niveśane pratyatiṣṭhan /
K10vimkn_u:1545: tac ca gṛhaṃ tāvad vistīrṇaṃ saṃdṛśyate,
K10vimkn_u:1547: na ca vaiśālyā mahānagaryā āvaraṇaṃ kṛtam,
K10vimkn_u:1550: sarve te tathaiva saṃdṛśyante yathā pūrvaṃ tathā paścāt /
K10vimkn_u:1551: Vkn 5.8 atha vimalakīrtir licchavir mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtam etad avocat:
K10vimkn_u:1552: niṣida tvaṃ mañjuśrīḥ siṃhāsane sārdham etair bodhisatvaiḥ /
K10vimkn_u:1553: tādṛśāṃś cātmabhāvān adhitiṣṭhata yat siṃhāsaneṣv anurūpāḥ syuḥ /
K10vimkn_u:1554: atha ye 'bhijñāpratilabdhā bodhisatvās te dvācatvāriṃśadyojanaśatasahasram ātmabhāvam adhiṣṭhāya teṣu siṃhāsaneṣu nisīdanti sma /
K10vimkn_u:1555: ye cādikarmikā bodhisatvās te na śaknuvanti sma teṣu siṃhāsaneṣu niṣattum /
K10vimkn_u:1556: atha vimalakīrtir licchavir āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputram āmantrayate sma:
K10vimkn_u:1558: āha: na śaknomi satpuruṣa niṣattum uccāni pragṛhitāni cemāni siṃhāsanāni /
K10vimkn_u:1559: āha: tena hi bhadantaśāriputra tasyaiva bhagavato merupradīparājasya tathāgatasya namaskāraṃ kuru /
K10vimkn_u:1561: atha te mahāśrāvakās tasya bhagavato merupradīparājasya tathāgatasya namaskāraṃ kurvanti sma /
K10vimkn_u:1562: te tatra paścāt teṣu siṃhāsaneṣu nyaṣīdan /
K10vimkn_u:1563: Vkn 5.9 athāyuṣmāñ śāriputro vimalakirtiṃ licchavim evam āha:
K10vimkn_u:1564: āścaryaṃ kulaputra yad ihaivaṃ parītte gṛha imānīyanti siṃhāsanasahasrāṇy evam uccāny evaṃ pragṛhītāni vicitrāṇi /
K10vimkn_u:1565: na ca vaiśālyā mahānagaryā āvaraṇaṃ kṛtam,
K10vimkn_u:1570: tathaiva saṃdṛśyante yathā pūrvaṃ tathā paścāt /
K10vimkn_u:1572: asti bhadantaśāriputra tathāgatānāṃ bodhisatvānāṃ cācintyo nāma vimokṣaḥ,
K10vimkn_u:1573: yatrācintyavimokṣe pratiṣṭhito bodhisatvaḥ sumeruṃ parvatarājaṃ tāvad uccaṃ tāvat pragṛhītaṃ tāvad udviddhaṃ tāvad vistīrṇaṃ sarṣapaphalakośe praveśayet /
K10vimkn_u:1577: na cāturmahārājakāyikā devās trayastriṃśato vā jānīran ḥ kasmin vayaṃ prakṣiptāḥ /
K10vimkn_u:1578: anye ca satvā ṛddhivineyā jānīyuḥ paśyeyus taṃ sumeruṃ parvatarājaṃ sarśapaphalakośapraviṣṭam /
K10vimkn_u:1579: ayaṃ bhadantaśāriputra bodhisatvānām acintyasya vimokṣasya viṣayapraveśaḥ /
K10vimkn_u:1580: Vkn 5.11 punar aparaṃ bhadantaśāriputra acintyavimokṣapratiṣṭhito bodhisatvo yaś caturṣu mahāsamudreṣv apskandhas tam ekasmin romakūpe prakṣipet
K10vimkn_u:1581: na ca matsyakacchapaśiśumāramaṇḍūkānām anyeṣāṃ vaudakānāṃ prāṇināṃ pīḍā bhavet /
K10vimkn_u:1582: na ca nāgayakṣagandharvāsurāṇām evaṃ bhavet ḥ kasmin vayaṃ prakṣiptāḥ /
K10vimkn_u:1584: na ca kaścit satvo vihiṃsito viheṭhito vā bhavet /
K10vimkn_u:1585: Vkn 5.12 imaṃ ca trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātuṃ bhārgavacakram iva parigṛhya dakṣiṇe pāṇāv avabhrāmya gaṅgānadīvālikāsamān lokadhātūn kṣipet
K10vimkn_u:1586: na ca satvā jānīran ḥ kasmin vayaṃ nītāḥ,
K10vimkn_u:1591: Vkn 5.13 punar aparaṃ bhadantaśāriputra santi satvā apramāṇasaṃsāravainayikāḥ /
K10vimkn_u:1593: tatrācintyavimokṣapratiṣṭhito bodhisatvo 'pramāṇasaṃsāravainayikānāṃ satvānāṃ vainayikavaśam upādāya saptarātraṃ kalpam atikrāntam ādarśayet
K10vimkn_u:1594: saṃkṣiptasaṃsāravainayikānāṃ satvānāṃ vainayikavaśam upādāya kalpaṃ saptarātram atikrāntam ādarśayet /
K10vimkn_u:1595: tatrāpramāṇasaṃsāravineyāḥ satvāḥ saptarātraṃ kalpam atikrāntaṃ saṃjānīran I saṃkṣiptasaṃsāravineyāḥ satvāḥ kalpaṃ saptarātram atikrāntaṃ saṃjānīran
K10vimkn_u:1596: Vkn 5.14 iti hy acintyavimokṣapratiṣṭhito bodhisatvaḥ sarvabuddhakṣetraguṇavyūhān ekasmin buddhakṣetre saṃdarśayati /
K10vimkn_u:1597: sarvasatvān api dakṣiṇe karatale pratiṣṭhāpya cittajāyikayarddhyā kramet /
K10vimkn_u:1600: yāvatyaś ca daśasu dikṣu buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ pūjā vartante,
K10vimkn_u:1602: yāvantaś ca daśasu dikṣu candrasūryās tārārūpāni ca,
K10vimkn_u:1604: yāvatyaś ca daśasu dikṣu vātamaṇḍalyaḥ pravānti,
K10vimkn_u:1607: na ca tatra buddhakṣetre tṛṇavanaspatayo nameyuḥ /
K10vimkn_u:1608: Vkn 5.15 yāni ca daśasu dikṣu buddhakṣetrāṇy uddahyante kalpoddāhena,
K10vimkn_u:1609: tad api sarvam agniskandhaṃ svamukhe prakṣipet /
K10vimkn_u:1610: yac ca tena karma kartavyaṃ bhavet,
K10vimkn_u:1612: yac cāvastād gaṅgānadīvālikākoṭīsameṣu buddhakṣetreṣv atikramya buddhakṣetram,
K10vimkn_u:1613: tad abhyutkṣipyordhaṃ digbhāgaṃ gaṅgānadīvālikākoṭīsameṣu buddhakṣetreṣu pratiṣṭhāpayet /
K10vimkn_u:1614: tadyathāpi nāma balavān puruṣaḥ sūcyagreṇa badarīpatram utkṣipet /
K10vimkn_u:1615: Vkn 5.16 evam acṃtyavimokṣapratiṣṭhito bodhisatvaḥ sarvasatvāni cakravartyādirūpāṇy adhitiṣṭhet /
K10vimkn_u:1616: Vkn 5.17 yāvantaś ca daśasu dikṣu śabdāvabhāsāḥ śabdaprajñāptayaḥ,
K10vimkn_u:1617: tāḥ sarvā hīnamadhyaviśiṣṭānāṃ satvānāṃ sarvabuddhaghoṣarutaracitāny adhitiṣṭhan,
K10vimkn_u:1619: yāvadbhiś cākāranirdeśair daśasu dikṣu buddhā bhagavanto dharmaṃ deśayanti,
K10vimkn_u:1621: Vkn 5.18 ayaṃ bhadantaśāriputra acintyavimokṣapratiṣṭhitānāṃ bodhisatvānāṃ yatkiṃcinmātro viṣayāvatāranirdeśaḥ /
K10vimkn_u:1622: api tu kalpam ahaṃ bhadantaśāriputra kalpāvaśesaṃ vācintyavimokṣapratiṣṭhitānāṃ bodhisatvānāṃ viṣayānāṃ viṣayāvatāranirdeśaṃ nirdiśeyam,
K10vimkn_u:1624: Vkn 5.19 atha khalu sthaviro mahākāśyapa imaṃ bodhisatvānām acintyavimokṣaṃ śrutvāścaryaprāptaḥ sthaviraṃ śāriputram etad avocat:
K10vimkn_u:1625: tadyathāpi nāma āyuṣmañ śāriputra jātyandhasya puruṣasya purastāt kaścid eva sarvarūpagatāny upadarśayet /
K10vimkn_u:1626: na ca tatra sa jātyandha ekarūpam api paśyet /
K10vimkn_u:1627: evam eva āyuṣmañ śāriputra ihācintyavimokṣe nirdiśyamāne sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhā iha jātyandhā iva cakṣurvihīnā ekasminn apy acintyakāraṇe na pratyakṣāḥ /
K10vimkn_u:1628: ko nāma vidvān imam acintyaṃ vimokṣaṃ śrutvānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittaṃ notpādayet /
K10vimkn_u:1629: tat kiṃ nu bhūyaḥ kariṣyāmo 'tyantopahatendriyā dagdhavinaṣṭānīva bījāny abhājanībhūtā iha mahāyāne /
K10vimkn_u:1630: sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhair imaṃ dharmanirdeśaṃ śrutvā rudadbhis trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātur vijñāpayitavyaḥ /
K10vimkn_u:1631: sarvabodhisatvaiś ca pramuditair imam acintyavimokṣaṃ śrutvā mūrdhnā saṃpratyetavyaḥ,
K10vimkn_u:1634: imaṃ nirdeśaṃ nirdiśataḥ sthavirasya mahākāśyapasya dvātriṃśatā devaputrasahasrair anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittāny utpannāni /
K10vimkn_u:1635: Vkn 5.20 atha vimalakīrtir licchaviḥ sthaviraṃ mahākāśyapam evam āha:
K10vimkn_u:1636: yāvanto bhadantamahākāśyapa daśasu dikṣv aprameyeṣu lokadhātuṣu mārā māratvaṃ kārayanti,
K10vimkn_u:1637: sarve te yadbhūyasācintyavimokṣapratiṣṭhitā bodhisatvā upāyakauśalyena satvaparipācanāya māratvaṃ kārayanti /
K10vimkn_u:1638: yāvadbhir bhadantamahākāśyapa daśasu dikṣv aprameyeṣu lokadhātuṣu bodhisatvā yācanakair
K10vimkn_u:1639: yācyante hastapādān vā karṇanāsaṃ vā śoṇitaṃ snāyuṃ vāsthimajjānaṃ vā netrāṇi vottamāṅgāni
K10vimkn_u:1640: śirāṃsi vāṅgapratyaṅgāni vā rājyarāṣṭrajanapadān vā bhāryāputraduhitṝr vā dāsadāsīr
K10vimkn_u:1644: sarve te yācanakā yadbhūyasācintyavimokṣapratiṣṭhitā bodhisatvā upāyakauśalyenemāṃ dṛḍhādhyāśayatāṃ darśayanti /
K10vimkn_u:1646: ugratapaso hi bhadantamahākāśyapa bodhisatvās ta evaṃ darśayanti /
K10vimkn_u:1648: tadyathāpi nāma bhadantamahākāśyapa na śaktir asti khadyotakasya sūryamaṇḍalaprabhām abhibhavitum /
K10vimkn_u:1649: evam eva bhadantamahākāśyapa na śaktir asti prākṛtasya janasya bodhisatvenānavakāśakṛtasyopasaṃkramituṃ yācituṃ vā /
K10vimkn_u:1650: tadyathā bhadantamahākāśyapa yo hastināgasya prahāro na sa śakyo gardabhena soḍhum /
K10vimkn_u:1651: evam eva bhadantamahākāśyapa na śakyam abodhisatvena bodhisatvasyotpīḍanaṃ soḍhum /
K10vimkn_u:1655: Vkn 6.1 atha khalu mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūto vimalakīrtiṃ licchavim etad avocat:
K10vimkn_u:1657: āha: tadyathāpi nāma mañjuśrīḥ vijñapuruṣa udakacandram avekṣeta,
K10vimkn_u:1659: tadyathāpi nāma mañjuśrīḥ ādarśamaṇḍale mukhamaṇḍalam ālokayet,
K10vimkn_u:1663: tadyathā mañjuśrīḥ māyākāro māyākāranirmitaṃ puruṣam avekṣeta,
K10vimkn_u:1722: evaṃ hi mañjuśrīr bodhisatvena sarvasatvāḥ pratyavekṣitavyāḥ /
K10vimkn_u:1723: Vkn 6.2 āha: yadi kulaputraivaṃ bodhisatvena sarvasatvāḥ pratyavekṣitavyāḥ,
K10vimkn_u:1724: kathaṃ punar asya mahāmaitrī bhavati sarvasatveṣu /
K10vimkn_u:1725: āha: yadā mañjuśrīḥ bodhisatva evaṃ pratyavekṣate,
K10vimkn_u:1726: mayā hy eṣāṃ satvānām evaṃ dharmaparijñāyai dharmo deśayitavya iti,
K10vimkn_u:1758: Vkn 6.3 āha: katarā punar asya mahākaruṇā /
K10vimkn_u:1759: āha: yat kṛtaṃ kṛtaṃ kuśalamūlaṃ sarvasatvebhya utsṛjati /
K10vimkn_u:1766: āha: saṃsārabhayabhītena mañjuśriḥ bodhisatvena buddhamāhātmyaṃ pratipattavyam /
K10vimkn_u:1771: Vkn 6.5 āha: sarvasatvapramokṣaṃ kartukāmena kiṃ kartavyam /
K10vimkn_u:1773: āha: kleśān utsraṣṭukāmena kathaṃ prayuktena bhavitavyam /
K10vimkn_u:1774: āha: kleśān utsraṣṭukāmena yoniśaḥ prayuktena bhavitavyam /
K10vimkn_u:1775: āha: kathaṃ prayuktaḥ punar yoniśaḥ prayukto bhavati /

K10vimkn_u:2292: na saṃbhavati na vibhavaty ayam advayapraveśaḥ /
