K10vimkn_u:2304: yā ca puṇyāpuṇyāniñjyānāṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ svalakṣaṇaśūnyatā na tatra puṇyāpuṇyāniñjyāḥ saṃskārāḥ /
K10vimkn_u:2320: tathā hi nirodhasamāpannasya na tamo na prakāśaḥ /
K10vimkn_u:2325: yasya na nirvāṇe 'bhiratir na saṃsāre 'nabhiratir idam advayam /
K10vimkn_u:2328: yo 'tyantam evābaddhaḥ sa kiṃ mokṣaṃ paryeṣiṣyate /
K10vimkn_u:2329: abaddho 'mukto bhikṣur na ratim utpādayati nāratim ayam advayapraveśaḥ /
K10vimkn_u:2333: asamudācārasthitasya na mārgasaṃjñā bhavati na kumārgasaṃjñā /
K10vimkn_u:2334: saṃjñāparijñātāvino hi dvaye buddhir nākrāmaty ayam asyādvayapraveśaḥ /
K10vimkn_u:2344: yatra ca na paśyanā na vipaśyanāyam advayapraveśaḥ /
K10vimkn_u:2345: Vkn 8.32 ity evaṃ te bodhisatvāḥ svakasvakān nirdeśān nirdiśya mañjuśriyam kumārabhūtam etad avocat:
K10vimkn_u:2349: api tu yāvad yuṣmābhir nirdiṣṭaṃ sarvam etad dvayam /
K10vimkn_u:2350: ekanirdeśaṃ sthāpayitvā yaḥ sarvadharmāṇām anudāhāro 'pravyāhāro 'nudīranākīrtanānabhilapanam aprajñapanam ayam advayapraveśaḥ /
K10vimkn_u:2351: Vkn 8.33 atha khalu mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūto vimalakīrtiṃ licchavim etad avocat:
K10vimkn_u:2355: atha mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūto vimalakīrter licchaveḥ sādhukāram adāt:
K10vimkn_u:2356: sādhu sādhu kulaputra ayaṃ bodhisatvānām advayadharmamukhapraveśo yatra nākṣararutaravitavijñaptipracāraḥ /
K10vimkn_u:2357: iha nirdeśe nirdiśyamāne pañcānāṃ bodhisatvasahasrāṇām advayadharmamukhapraveśād anutpattikadharmakṣāntipratilambho 'bhūt // //
K10vimkn_u:2363: atha vimalakīrtir licchavir āyuṣmataḥ śāriputrasya cetasā cetaḥparivitarkam ājñāyāyuṣmantaṃ śāriputram evam āha:
K10vimkn_u:2364: ye te bhadantaśāriputra tathāgatenāṣṭau vimokṣā ākhyātās tair vimokṣair vihara /
K10vimkn_u:2365: tvaṃ mā āmiṣamrakṣitayā saṃtatyā dharmaṃ śrauṣīḥ /
K10vimkn_u:2366: api tu khalu punar bhadantaśāriputra muhūrtam āgamayasva,
K10vimkn_u:2368: Vkn 9.2 atha vimalakīrtir licchavis tasyāṃ velāyāṃ tathārūpaṃ samādhisamāpannaḥ tādṛśaṃ carddhyabhisaṃskāram abhisaṃskṛtavān /
K10vimkn_u:2369: yad ūrdhve digbhāga ito buddhakṣetrād dvācatvāriṃśad gaṅgānadīvālikāsamāni buddhakṣetrāṇy
K10vimkn_u:2370: atikramya sarvagandhasugandhaṃ nāma lokadhātuṃ teṣāṃ bodhisatvānāṃ teṣāṃ ca mahāśrāvakāṇām upadarśayati /
K10vimkn_u:2371: tatra gandhottamakūṭo nāma tathāgata etarhi tiṣṭhati dhriyate yāpayati /
K10vimkn_u:2372: tatra ca lokadhātau yādṛśā daśasu dikṣu sarvabuddhakṣetreṣu divyā mānuṣyakāś ca gandhā vānti /
K10vimkn_u:2373: te tatra lokadhātau vṛkṣebhyo viśiṣṭatamā gandhā vānti /
K10vimkn_u:2374: tatra lokadhātau nāsti śrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ nāmadheyam api /
K10vimkn_u:2376: sa tebhyo gandhottamakūṭas tathāgato dharmaṃ deśayati /
K10vimkn_u:2379: yaṃ ca te bodhisatvā āhāram āharanti tasya bhojanasya yo gandhaḥ so 'pramāṇāl lokadhātūn spharati /
K10vimkn_u:2380: tasmiṃś ca samaye bhagavān gandhottamakūṭas tathāgato bhaktāya niṣaṇṇo 'bhut sārdhaṃ tair bodhisatvaiḥ /
K10vimkn_u:2381: tatra gandhavyuhāhārā nāma devaputrā mahāyānasaṃprasthitās tasya bhagavatas teṣāṃ bodhisatvānām upasthānaparicaryāyā udyuktāḥ /
K10vimkn_u:2382: tatra sā sarvā parṣat taṃ lokadhātuṃ paśyati taṃ ca bhagavantaṃ tāṃś ca bodhisatvān bhaktāgraniṣaṇnān /
K10vimkn_u:2383: Vkn 9.3 atha vimalakīrtir licchavis tān sarvān bodhisatvān āmantrayate sma:
K10vimkn_u:2384: ko yuṣmākaṃ satpuruṣāḥ utsahate 'to buddhakṣetrād bhojanam ānetum /
K10vimkn_u:2386: atha vimalakīrtir licchavir mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtam evam āha:
K10vimkn_u:2387: na tvaṃ mañjuśrīḥ paryapatrapasa īdṛśyā parṣadā /
K10vimkn_u:2388: āha: nanūktaṃ kulaputra tathāgatenāśikṣito na paribhavitavya iti /
K10vimkn_u:2389: Vkn 9.4 atha vimalakīrtir licchavir anuttiṣṭhann etataḥ śayanāt puratas teṣāṃ bodhisatvānāṃ nirmitaṃ bodhisatvaṃ nirmimīte sma /
K10vimkn_u:2390: suvarṇavarṇena kāyena lakṣaṇānuvyañjanasamalaṃkṛtena tasya tādṛśo rūpāvabhāso 'bhūd yena sā sarvā parṣad dhyāmīkṛtā bhavet /
K10vimkn_u:2391: atha vimalakīrtir licchavis taṃ nirmitaṃ bodhisatvam evam āha:
K10vimkn_u:2392: gaccha kulaputra ūrdhaṃdigbhāge dvācatvāriṃśad gaṅgānadīvālikāsamāni buddhakṣetrāṇy atikramya sarvagandhasugandho nāma lokadhātuḥ /
K10vimkn_u:2395: tatra gatvā madvacanāt tasya tathāgatasya pādau śirasā vanditvaivaṃ vada ḥ vimalakīrtir
K10vimkn_u:2396: licchavir bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavato 'lpābādhatāṃ ca paripṛcchaty
K10vimkn_u:2397: alpātaṅkatāṃ ca laghutthānatāṃ ca yātrāṃ ca balaṃ ca sukhaṃ cānavadyatāṃ ca sparśavihāratāṃ ca /
K10vimkn_u:2398: evaṃ ca vadati ḥ dehi me bhagavan bhuktāvaśeṣaṃ yat sahe lokadhātau buddhakṛtyaṃ kariṣyati /
K10vimkn_u:2399: eṣāṃ ca hīnādhimuktikanāṃ satvānam udārāṃ matiṃ rocayiṣyati /
K10vimkn_u:2401: Vkn 9.5 atha sa nirmito bodhisatvo vimalakīrter licchaveḥ sādhv iti pratiśrutya teṣāṃ bodhisatvānāṃ purata ūrdhamukhaḥ saṃdṛśyate /
K10vimkn_u:2402: na cainaṃ te bodhisatvāḥ paśyanti gacchantam /
K10vimkn_u:2403: atha sa nirmito bodhisatvas taṃ sarvagandhasugandhaṃ lokadhātum anuprāptaḥ /
K10vimkn_u:2404: sa tatra bhagavato gandhottamakūṭasya tathāgatasya pādau śirasā vanditvaivam āha:
K10vimkn_u:2405: vimalakīrtir bhagavan bodhisatvo bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vandate /
K10vimkn_u:2406: alpābādhatāṃ ca paripṛcchaty alpātaṅkatāṃ ca laghūtthānatāṃ ca yātrāṃ ca balaṃ ca sukhaṃ cānavadyatāṃ ca sparśavihāratāṃ ca /
K10vimkn_u:2407: sa ca bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvaivam āha:
K10vimkn_u:2408: dehi me bhagavan bhuktāvaśeṣaṃ bhojanaṃ yad idaṃ sahe lokadhātau buddhakṛtyaṃ kariṣyati /
K10vimkn_u:2409: teṣāṃ hīnādhimuktānāṃ satvānām udāreṣu buddhadharmeṣu matiṃ rocayiṣyati /
K10vimkn_u:2410: bhagavataś ca nāmadheyaṃ vaistārikaṃ kṛtaṃ bhaviṣyati /
K10vimkn_u:2411: Vkn 9.6 atha khalu ye tasya bhagavato gandhottamakūṭasya tathāgatasya buddhakṣetre bodhisatvās te vismitās taṃ bhagavantaṃ gandhottamakūṭaṃ tathāgatam evam āhuḥ:
K10vimkn_u:2415: evaṃ te bodhisatvās taṃ tathāgataṃ paripṛcchanti /
K10vimkn_u:2416: atha sa bhagavāṃs tān bodhisatvān evam āha:
K10vimkn_u:2417: asti kulaputrāḥ adhodigbhāga ito buddhakṣetrād dvācatvāriṃśad gaṅgānadīvālikāsamāni buddhakṣetrāṇy atikramya saho lokadhātuḥ /
K10vimkn_u:2418: tatra śākyamunir nāma tathāgato dharmaṃ deśayati hīnādhimuktikānāṃ satvānāṃ pañcakaṣāye buddhakṣetre /
K10vimkn_u:2419: tatra vimalakīrtir nāma bodhisatvo 'cintyavimokṣapratiṣṭhito bodhisatvebhyo dharmaṃ deśayati /
K10vimkn_u:2420: tenaiṣa nirmito bodhisatvo 'nupreṣito mama nāmadheyaparikīrtanāyāsya ca lokadhātor varṇasaṃprakāśanāya teṣāṃ ca bodhisatvānāṃ kuśalamūlottānatāyai
K10vimkn_u:2421: Vkn 9.7 atha te bodhisatvā evam āhuḥ:
K10vimkn_u:2422: kiyan mahātmā sa bhagavan bodhisatvo yasyāyaṃ nirmita evam ṛddhibalavaiśāradyaprāptaḥ /
K10vimkn_u:2424: tathā mahātmā sa bodhisatvo yat sarvabuddhakṣetreṣu nirmitān preṣayati /
K10vimkn_u:2425: te ca nirmitā buddhakṛtyena satvānāṃ pratyupasthitā bhavanti /
K10vimkn_u:2426: Vkn 9.8 atha sa bhagavān gandhottamakūṭas tathāgataḥ sarvagandhasamīhite bhājane taṃ sarvagandhaparivāsitaṃ bhojanaṃ tasmai bodhisatvāya prādāt
K10vimkn_u:2428: gamiṣyāmo vayaṃ bhagavan taṃ sahaṃ lokadhātuṃ taṃ bhagavantaṃ śākyamuniṃ vandanāyaitaṃ ca vimalakīrtiṃ tāṃś ca bodhisatvān darśanāya /
K10vimkn_u:2431: api tu gandhān kulaputrāḥ pratisaṃhṛtya taṃ lokadhātuṃ praviśata,
K10vimkn_u:2434: mā te sahe lokadhātau satvā madgubhūtā bhaveyuḥ /
K10vimkn_u:2439: satvaparipākāya tu buddhā bhagavanto na sarvaṃ buddhaviṣayaṃ saṃdarśayanti /
K10vimkn_u:2440: Vkn 9.9 atha nirmito bodhisatvas tad bhojanam ādāya sārdhaṃ tair navatyā bodhisatvasahasrair
K10vimkn_u:2441: buddhānubhāvena vimalakīrtyadhiṣṭhānena ca tenaiva kṣaṇalavamuhūrtena sarvagandhasugandhe
K10vimkn_u:2442: lokadhātāv antarhito vimalakīrter licchaver gṛhe pratyaṣṭhāt /
K10vimkn_u:2443: Vkn 9.10 tatra vimalakirtir navatisiṃhāsanasahasrāṇy adhitiṣṭhati yādṛśāny eva tāni prathamakāni siṃhāsanāni /
K10vimkn_u:2445: sa ca nirmitas tad bhojanaparipūrṇaṃ bhājanaṃ vimalakīrter licchaver upanāmayati sma /
K10vimkn_u:2446: tasya bhojanasya gandhena sarvā vaiśālī mahānagarī nirdhūpitābhūd yāvat sāhasro lokadhātuḥ sugandhagandhīkṛto 'bhūt /
K10vimkn_u:2447: tatra vaiśālakā brāhmaṇagṛhapatayaḥ somacchatraś ca nāma licchavīnām adhipatis taṃ
K10vimkn_u:2450: tenaiva ca bhojanagandhena bhūmāvacarā devaputrāḥ kāmāvacarā rūpāvacarāś ca devāḥ saṃcoditā vimalakīrter licchaver gṛham upasaṃkrāntā abhūvan
K10vimkn_u:2451: Vkn 9.11 atha vimalakīrtir licchaviḥ sthaviraṃ śāriputraṃ tāṃś ca mahāśrāvakān etad avocat:
K10vimkn_u:2455: Vkn 9.12 tatra keṣāṃcic chrāvakāṇām etad abhavat:
K10vimkn_u:2456: ita evaṃ parīttād bhojanāt katham iyam īdṛśī parṣat paribhokṣyata iti /
K10vimkn_u:2457: tān sa nirmito bodhisatvaḥ śrāvakān etad avocat:
K10vimkn_u:2458: mā yūyam āyuṣmantaḥ svaprajñāpuṇyais tathāgataprajñāpuṇyāni samīkārṣṭa /
K10vimkn_u:2460: na tv evāsya bhojanasya kaścit parikṣayaḥ /
K10vimkn_u:2461: sacet sarvasatvā api sumerumātrair ālopaiḥ kalpaṃ paribhuñjīran,
K10vimkn_u:2464: akṣayaśīlasamādhiprajñānirjātasyedaṃ tathāgatasya pātrāvaśeṣaṃ bhojanaṃ naitac chakyaṃ kṣapayitum /
K10vimkn_u:2465: Vkn 9.13 atha tato bhojanāt sarvā sā parṣat tṛptā kṛtā /
K10vimkn_u:2467: yaiś ca bodhisatvaiḥ śrāvakaiḥ śakrabrahmalokapālais tadanyaiś ca satvais tad bhojanaṃ bhuktam,
K10vimkn_u:2468: teṣāṃ tādṛśaṃ sukhaṃ kāye 'vakrāntaṃ yādṛśaṃ sarvasukhapratimaṇḍite lokadhātau bodhisatvānāṃ sukham /
K10vimkn_u:2469: sarvaromakūpebhyaś ca teṣāṃ tādṛśo gandhaḥ pravāti /
K10vimkn_u:2470: tadyathāpi nāma tasminn eva sarvagandhasugandhe lokadhātau vṛkṣāṇāṃ gandhaḥ /
K10vimkn_u:2471: Vkn 9.14 atha vimalakīrtir licchavir jānann eva tān bhagavato gandhottamakūṭasya tathāgatasya buddhakṣetrād āgatān bodhisatvān etad avocat:
K10vimkn_u:2475: tenaiva gandhena te bodhisatvā vinayaṃ gacchanti /
K10vimkn_u:2476: yatra yatraiva gandhavṛkṣe te bodhisatvā niṣīdanti,
K10vimkn_u:2477: tatas tatas tādṛśo gandhaḥ pravāti yat samanantarāghrāte gandhe sarvabodhisatvaguṇākaraṃ
K10vimkn_u:2478: nāma samādhiṃ pratilabhante yasya samādheḥ samanantarapratilambhāt sarveṣāṃ bodhisatvaguṇā jāyante /
K10vimkn_u:2479: Vkn 9.15 atha te bodhisatvā vimalakīrtiṃ licchavim etad avocan:
K10vimkn_u:2480: iha punar bhagavāñ śākyamuniḥ kīdṛśīṃ dharmadeśanāṃ prakāśayati /
K10vimkn_u:2482: teṣāṃ durdamānāṃ satvānāṃ khaṭuṅkadurdamadamathakathām eva prakāśayati /
K10vimkn_u:2540: ity evam anekadharmaparibhāṣaṇatayā khaṭuṅkāśvasadṛśacittāḥ satvā avasthāpyante /
K10vimkn_u:2541: tadyathā khaṭuṅko hayo gajo vā yāvan marmavedhena damathaṃ gacchati,
K10vimkn_u:2542: evam eveha durdamāḥ khaṭuṅkāḥ satvās te sarvaduḥkhaparibhāṣaṇakathābhir damathaṃ gacchanti /
K10vimkn_u:2544: āścaryaṃ bhagavataḥ śākyamuner yatra hi nāma pratisaṃhṛtya buddhamāhātmyaṃ daridralūhatayā khaṭuṅkān satvān vinayati /
K10vimkn_u:2545: ye 'pi bodhisatvā ihaivaṃ pratikaṣṭe buddhakṣetre prativasanti teṣām apy acintyā mahākaruṇā /
K10vimkn_u:2547: evam eva satpuruṣāḥ tathaitad yathā vadatha /
K10vimkn_u:2550: te bahutaram iha lokadhātāv ekajanmanā kariṣyanti satvārtham /
K10vimkn_u:2551: na tv eva tatra sarvagandhasugandhe lokadhātau kalpasahasreṇa satvārthaḥ /
K10vimkn_u:2553: iha hi satpuruṣāḥ sahe lokadhātau daśa kuśaloccayā dharmāḥ,
K10vimkn_u:2567: imān daśa kuśaloccayān dharmān pratigṛhṇanti ye tadanyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu na saṃvidyante /
K10vimkn_u:2569: katamair dharmaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisatvo 'kṣaṭo 'nupahataḥ sahāl lokadhātoś cyutvā pariśuddhaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ gacchati /
K10vimkn_u:2571: aṣṭābhiḥ kulaputraḥ dharmaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisatvaḥ sahāl lokadhātoś cyutvākṣaṭo 'nupahataḥ pariśuddhaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ gacchati /
K10vimkn_u:2573: yad uta sarvasatvānāṃ mayā hitaṃ kartavyam,
K10vimkn_u:2574: na caiṣāṃ sakāśāt kiṃcid dhitaṃ paryeṣitavyam,
K10vimkn_u:2575: sarvasatvaduḥkhaṃ cānenotsoḍhavyaṃ sarvaṃ cānena kuśalamūlaṃ sarvasatvānām utsraṣṭavyam,
K10vimkn_u:2578: aśrutānāṃ ca dharmāṇāṃ śrutānāṃ ca śravaṇād apratikṣepaḥ,
K10vimkn_u:2581: ebhir aṣṭābhir dharmaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisatvaḥ sahāl lokadhātoś cyutvākṣaṭo 'nupahataḥ pariśuddhaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ gacchati /
K10vimkn_u:2582: atha vimalakīrtir licchavir mañjuśrīś ca kumārabhūtas tasyāṃ parṣadi saṃnipatitāyāṃ
K10vimkn_u:2583: tathā dharmaṃ deśayato yathā paripūrṇasya prāṇisahasrasyānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittāny utpannāni,
K10vimkn_u:2586: Vkn 10.1 tena khalu punaḥ samayena bhagavata āmrapālīvane dharmaṃ deśayataḥ sa maṇḍalamāḍo vipulaś ca vistīrṇaś ca saṃsthito 'bhūt /
K10vimkn_u:2587: sā ca parṣat suvarṇavarṇā saṃdṛśyate sma /
K10vimkn_u:2589: kasyedaṃ bhagavan pūrvanimittaṃ yad idam āmrapālīvanam evaṃ vistīrṇaṃ saṃsthitaṃ sarvā ca parṣat suvarṇavarṇā saṃdṛśyate /
K10vimkn_u:2591: eṣa ānanda vimalakīrtir licchavir mañjuśrīś ca kumārabhūto mahatyā parṣadā parivṛtau tathāgatasyāntikam upasaṃkramiṣyataḥ /
K10vimkn_u:2592: Vkn 10.2 atha vimalakīrtir licchavir mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtam etad avocat:
K10vimkn_u:2594: ime ca mahāsatvās tathāgataṃ drakṣyanti vandiṣyante ca /
K10vimkn_u:2595: āha: gacchāma kulaputra yasyedānīṃ kālaṃ manyase /
K10vimkn_u:2596: atha vimalakīrtir licchavis tādṛśam ṛddhyabhisaṃskāram abhisaṃskaroti sma /
K10vimkn_u:2597: yathā tāṃ sarvāvatīṃ parṣadaṃ sārdhaṃ taiḥ siṃhāsanair dakṣiṇe pāṇau pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāmat /
K10vimkn_u:2598: upasaṃkramya tāṃ parṣadaṃ dharaṇitale pratiṣṭhāpya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavantaṃ saptakṛtvaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtyaikānte 'sthāt /
K10vimkn_u:2599: atha ye te bodhisatvā gandhottamakūṭasya tathāgatasya buddhakṣetrād āgatāḥ,
K10vimkn_u:2600: te cānye ca tebhyaḥ siṃhāsanebhyo 'vatīrya bhagavataḥ pādau śirobhir vanditvaikānte pratyatiṣṭhan /
K10vimkn_u:2601: evaṃ śakrabrahmalokapālā devaputrāś ca bhagavataḥ pādau śirobhir vanditvaikānte pratyatiṣṭhan /
K10vimkn_u:2602: atha sa bhagavāṃs tān bodhisatvān dharmyayā kathaya pratisaṃmodyaivam āha:
K10vimkn_u:2605: Vkn 10.3 tatra bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputram āmantrayate sma:
K10vimkn_u:2606: dṛṣṭaṃ te śāriputra eṣām agrasatvānāṃ bodhisatvānāṃ vikrīḍitam /
K10vimkn_u:2610: āha: acintyā saṃjñā me bhagavan tatrodapadyata yathā cintayituṃ tulayituṃ gaṇayituṃ na śaknomi tādṛśīṃ teṣām acintyāṃ kriyāṃ paśyāmi /
K10vimkn_u:2611: Vkn 10.4 athāyuṣmān ānando bhagavantam etad avocat:
K10vimkn_u:2614: āha: eṣām eva ānanda bodhisatvānāṃ sarvaromakūpebhyo gandhaḥ kāyāt pravāti /
K10vimkn_u:2616: asmākam apy āyuṣmann ānanda sarvaromakūpebhya īdṛśo gandhaḥ pravāti /
K10vimkn_u:2618: āha: vimalakīrtinā licchavinā gandhottamakūṭasya tathāgatasya buddhakṣetrāt sarvagandhasugandhāl lokadhātor bhojanam ānītam /
K10vimkn_u:2619: tad yāvadbhir bhuktaṃ sarveṣām īdṛśo gandhaḥ kāyāt pravāti /
K10vimkn_u:2620: Vkn 10.5 athāyuṣmān ānando vimalakīrtiṃ bodhisatvam evam āha:
K10vimkn_u:2622: āha: yāvad etad bhojanaṃ na pariṇataṃ bhaviṣyati /
K10vimkn_u:2623: ānanda āha: kiyaccireṇa punar etad bhojanaṃ pariṇaṃsyati /
K10vimkn_u:2627: Vkn 10.6 yaiś ca bhadantānanda bhikṣubhir anavakrāntaniyāmair etad bhojanaṃ bhuktaṃ teṣām avakrāntaniyāmānāṃ pariṇaṃsyati /
K10vimkn_u:2628: yaiḥ punar avakrāntaniyāmair bhuktaṃ teṣāṃ nāparimuktacittānāṃ pariṇaṃsyati /
K10vimkn_u:2629: yair anutpāditabodhicittaiḥ satvaiḥ paribhuktaṃ teṣām utpāditabodhicittānām pariṇaṃsyati /
K10vimkn_u:2630: yair utpāditabodhicittair bhuktaṃ teṣāṃ nāpratilabdhakṣāntikānāṃ pariṇaṃsyati /
K10vimkn_u:2631: yaiḥ punaḥ pratilabdhakṣāntikair bhuktaṃ teṣām ekajātipratibaddhānāṃ pariṇaṃsyati /
K10vimkn_u:2632: Vkn 10.7 tadyathāpi nāma bhadantānanda svādur nāma bhaiṣajyam,
K10vimkn_u:2633: tat tāvat kauṣṭhagataṃ na pariṇamati yāvan na sarvagataṃ viṣam apagataṃ bhavati /
K10vimkn_u:2635: evam eva bhadantānanda tāvad eva tad bhojanaṃ na pariṇataṃ bhavati yāvat sarvakleśaviṣaṃ na nirviṣaṃ bhavati /
K10vimkn_u:2639: āha: evam etad ānanda evam etad yathā vadasi /
K10vimkn_u:2640: Vkn 10.8 santy ānanda buddhakṣetrāṇi yeṣu bodhisatvā buddhakṛtyaṃ kurvanti /
K10vimkn_u:2641: santi buddhakṣetrāṇi yeṣu bodhivṛkṣo buddhakṛtyaṃ karoti /
K10vimkn_u:2642: santi buddhakṣetrāṇi yeṣu tathāgatalakṣaṇarūpadarśanaṃ buddhakṛtyaṃ karoti /
K10vimkn_u:2647: santy ānanda buddhakṣetrāṇi tādṛśāni pariśuddhāni yatrānudāhāratāpravyāhāratānirdeśatānabhilāpyatā teṣāṃ satvānāṃ buddhakṛtyaṃ karoti /
K10vimkn_u:2648: Vkn 10.10 na kaścid ānanda īryāpatho na kaścid upabhogo yo buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ satvavinayāya buddhakṛtyaṃ na karoti /
K10vimkn_u:2649: ye cema ānanda catvāro mārāś caturāśītiś ca kleśamukhaśatasahasrāṇi yaiḥ satvāḥ saṃkliśyante,
K10vimkn_u:2650: sarvais tair buddhā bhagavanto buddhakṛtyaṃ kurvanti /
K10vimkn_u:2651: Vkn 10.11 idam ānanda sarvabuddhadharmapraveśaṃ nāma dharmamukhaṃ yatra yatra dharmamukhe
K10vimkn_u:2652: praviṣṭo bodhisatvaḥ sarvodāravyūhaguṇasamanvāgateṣu buddhakṣetreṣu nāvalīyate nāvanamati /
K10vimkn_u:2653: sarvodāravyūhaguṇasamanvāgateṣu ca buddhakṣetreṣu na kṛṣyati nonnamati /
K10vimkn_u:2654: tathāgatānāṃ ca sakāśe so 'dhimātraṃ gauravam utpādayati /
K10vimkn_u:2655: āścaryam idaṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ sarvadharmasamatādhimuktānāṃ satvaparipācanatayā buddhakṣetranānātvadarśanam /
K10vimkn_u:2656: Vkn 10.12 tadyathā ānanda bhavati buddhakṣetrāṇām aparāparaguṇanānātvam,
K10vimkn_u:2658: evam eva ānanda bhavati tathāgatānaṃ rupakāyanānātvam,
K10vimkn_u:2660: Vkn 10.13 samā hy ānanda sarvabuddhā rūpeṇa varṇena tejasā vapuṣā lakṣaṇaiḥ kulamāhātmyena
K10vimkn_u:2661: śīlena samādhinā prajñayā vimuktyā vimuktijñānadarśanena balair vaiśāradyair buddhadharmair
K10vimkn_u:2662: mahāmaitryā mahākaruṇayā hitaiṣitayeryayā caryayā pratipadāyuḥpramāṇena dharmadeśanayā
K10vimkn_u:2664: tenocyate samyaksaṃbuddha iti tathāgata iti buddha iti /
K10vimkn_u:2665: eṣām ānanda trayāṇāṃ padānāṃ yo 'rthavistarapadavibhaṅgaḥ sa tvayā kalpasthitikenāpi na sukaraḥ paryavāptum /
K10vimkn_u:2666: trisāhasraparyāpannā apy ānanda satvās tvatsadṛśā bhaveyur agrā bahuśrutānāṃ smṛtidhāriṇīpratilabdhānām,
K10vimkn_u:2667: te 'pi sarve satvā ānandasadṛśā eṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ padānām arthaviniścayaṃ śrutasmṛtidhāriṇīlabdhānām arthaviniścayanirdeśaṃ kalpenāpi na śaknuyuḥ
K10vimkn_u:2668: yad idaṃ samyaksaṃbuddha iti tathāgata iti buddha iti /
K10vimkn_u:2671: Vkn 10.14 athāyuṣmān ānando bhagavantam etad avocat:
K10vimkn_u:2672: adyāgreṇāhaṃ bhagavan na bhūyo 'gro bahuśrutānām ity ātmānaṃ pratijñāsyāmi /
K10vimkn_u:2676: śrāvakān saṃdhāya tvaṃ mayā ānanda agro bahuśrutānāṃ nirdiṣṭaḥ,
K10vimkn_u:2680: śakyo hy ānanda sarvasāgarāṇāṃ gādhaḥ pramātum,
K10vimkn_u:2681: na tv eva śakyo bodhisatvānāṃ prajñājñānasmṛtidhāraṇīpratibhānasya gādhaḥ pramātum /
K10vimkn_u:2684: ya ima ānanda vimalakīrtinā licchavinaikapūrvabhakte vyūhāḥ saṃdarśitāḥ,
K10vimkn_u:2685: te sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhair ṛddhiprāptaiḥ sarvarddhivikurvitaprātihāryaiḥ kalpakoṭīśatasahasrāṇi na śakyāḥ saṃdarśayitum /
K10vimkn_u:2686: Vkn 10.15 atha ye te bodhisatvā bhagavato gandhottamakūṭasya tathāgatasya buddhakṣetrāt sarvagandhasugandhāl lokadhātor agataḥ,
K10vimkn_u:2689: pratiniḥsṛjāmo vayaṃ bhagavan tān manasikārān yair asmābhir iha buddhakṣetre hīnasaṃjñotpāditā /
K10vimkn_u:2691: acintyo hi bhagavan buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ buddhaviṣayaḥ /
K10vimkn_u:2692: upāyakauśalyena satvaparipākāya yathā yathecchanti tathā tathā kṣetravyūhān ādarśayanti /
K10vimkn_u:2693: dehi bhagavan asmabhyaṃ dharmaprābhṛtaṃ yathā vayaṃ tatra sarvagandhasugandhe lokadhātau gatā bhagavantam anusmarema /
K10vimkn_u:2695: asti kulaputrāḥ kṣayākṣayo nāma bodhisatvānāṃ vimokṣaḥ /
K10vimkn_u:2700: tad bodhisatvena saṃskṛtaṃ ca na kṣapayitavyam,
K10vimkn_u:2753: evaṃ hi kulaputrāḥ etaddharmādhimukto bodhisatvaḥ saṃskṛtaṃ na kṣapayati /
K10vimkn_u:2754: Vkn 10.18 kathaṃ punar asaṃskṛte na pratitiṣṭhate /
K10vimkn_u:2785: riktam iti ca tuccham iti cāsārakam iti cāsvāmikam iti cāniketam iti ca pratyavekṣate,
K10vimkn_u:2787: cātucchajñānaś ca paripūrṇasaṃkalpaś ca svayambhūjñānābhiṣiktaś ca svayambhūjñāne cābhiyukto nītārtho buddhavaṃśe pratiṣṭhito bhavati /
K10vimkn_u:2788: evaṃ hi kulaputrāḥ evaṃ dharmādhimukto bodhisatvo 'saṃskṛte na pratitiṣṭhate saṃskṛtaṃ na kṣapayati /
K10vimkn_u:2823: evaṃ hi kulaputrāḥ bodhisatvaḥ saṃskṛtaṃ na kṣapayati,
K10vimkn_u:2825: / ayam ucyate kṣayākṣayo nāma bodhisatvānāṃ vimokṣaḥ /
K10vimkn_u:2827: Vkn 10.20 atha khalu te bodhisatvā imaṃ nirdeśaṃ śrutvā tuṣṭā udagra āttamanasaḥ
K10vimkn_u:2828: pramuditāḥ prītisaumanasyajātā bhagavataḥ pūjākarmaṇe teṣāṃ ca bodhisatvānām asya
K10vimkn_u:2829: dharmaparyāyasya pūjākarmaṇe sarvam imaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātuṃ sarvacūrṇagandhadhupavyūhaiḥ
K10vimkn_u:2830: puṣpaiś ca jānumātraṃ saṃchādya bhagavataś ca parṣanmaṇḍalam abhikīrtiṃ kṛtvā bhagavataḥ
K10vimkn_u:2831: pādau śirobhir vanditvā bhagavantaṃ triṣpradakṣiṇīkṛtyodānam udānayanta iha buddhakṣetre
K10vimkn_u:2832: 'ntarhitās tena kṣaṇalavamuhūrtena tatra sarvagandhasugandhe lokadhātau pratyupasthitāḥ // //
K10vimkn_u:2834: Vkn 11.1 atha khalu bhagavān vimalakīrtiṃ licchavim etad avocat:
K10vimkn_u:2835: yadā tvaṃ kulaputra tathāgatasya darśanakāmo bhavasi,
K10vimkn_u:2837: evam ukte vimalakīrtir licchavir bhagavantam etad avocat:
K10vimkn_u:2848: ṣaḍāyatanānutpannaṃ cakṣuḥpathasamatikrāntaṃ śrotrapathasamatikrāntaṃ ghrāṇapathasamatikrāntaṃ jihvāpathasamatikrāntaṃ kāyapathasamatikrāntaṃ
K10vimkn_u:2859: na lakṣyate na saṃlakṣyate na vilakṣyate,
K10vimkn_u:2923: Vkn 11.2 athāyuṣmāñ śāriputro bhagavantam etad avocat:
K10vimkn_u:2924: katamasmād bhagavan buddhakṣetrāc cyutau vimalakīrtiḥ kulaputra idaṃ buddhakṣetram āgataḥ /
K10vimkn_u:2926: etam eva tvaṃ śāriputra satpuruṣaṃ paripṛccha ḥ kutas tvaṃ cyutvehopapanna iti /
K10vimkn_u:2927: athāyuṣmāñ śāriputro vimalakīrtiṃ licchavim etad avocat:
K10vimkn_u:2931: kaccit tasya dharmasya cyutir upapattir vā /
K10vimkn_u:2932: āha: na tasya dharmasya kācic cyutir upapattir vā /
K10vimkn_u:2933: āha: evam acyutikānām anutpattikānāṃ bhadantaśāriputra sarvadharmāṇāṃ kutas tavaivaṃ bhavati ḥ kutas tvaṃ cyutvehopapanna iti /
K10vimkn_u:2934: yaṃ bhadantaśāriputra nirmitāṃ striyaṃ puruṣaṃ vā pṛccheḥ ḥ kutas tvaṃ cyutvehopapanna iti /
K10vimkn_u:2936: āha: na kulaputra nirmitasya cyutir nopapattiḥ,
K10vimkn_u:2938: āha: nanu bhadantaśāriputra nirmitasvabhāvāḥ sarvadharmās tathāgatena nirdiṣṭāḥ /
K10vimkn_u:2940: āha: nirmitasvabhāveṣu bhadantaśāriputra sarvadharmeṣu ḥ kutas tvaṃ cyutvehopapanna iti /
K10vimkn_u:2947: Vkn 11.3 tatra bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputram āmantrayate sma:
K10vimkn_u:2948: akṣobhyasya śāriputra tathāgatasya sakāśād āgata eṣa kulaputro 'bhiratyā Iokadhātoḥ /
K10vimkn_u:2949: āha: āścaryaṃ bhagavan yad eṣa satpuruṣas tāvatpariśuddhād buddhakṣetrād āgatyehaivaṃ bahudoṣaduṣṭe buddhakṣetre 'bhiramate /
K10vimkn_u:2951: tat kiṃ manyase bhadantaśāriputra api nu sūryaraśmayo 'ndhakāreṇa sārdhaṃ ramante /
K10vimkn_u:2955: āha: kiṃ kāraṇaṃ punaḥ sūryo jambūdvīpa udayate /
K10vimkn_u:2957: āha: evam eva śāriputra saṃcintya bodhisatvā apariśuddheṣu buddhakṣetreṣūpapadyante satvānāṃ pariśodhanāya /
K10vimkn_u:2960: Vkn 11.4 atha sā sarvā parṣat paritṛṣitābhut:
K10vimkn_u:2961: paśyema vayaṃ tam abhiratiṃ lokadhātuṃ taṃ cākṣobhyaṃ tathāgataṃ tāṃś ca bodhisatvāṃs tāṃś ca mahāśrāvakān /
K10vimkn_u:2962: atha bhagavāṃs tasyāḥ sarvasyāḥ parṣadaś cetasa cetaḥparivitarkam ājñāya vimalakīrtiṃ licchavim etad avocat:
K10vimkn_u:2963: darśaya kulaputra asyāḥ parṣadas tām abhiratiṃ lokadhātuṃ taṃ cākṣobhyaṃ tathāgatam /
K10vimkn_u:2966: yan nv aham itaś cāsanān nottiṣṭheyam /
K10vimkn_u:2972: akṣobhyaṃ ca tathāgataṃ sāgaropamāyāṃ mahāparṣadi niṣaṇṇaṃ dharmaṃ deśayamānam,
K10vimkn_u:2973: api tāni padmāni yāni daśasu dikṣu buddhakṛtyaṃ kurvanti satvānām,
K10vimkn_u:2974: api tāni trīṇi ratnamayāni sopānāni yāni jambūdvīpam upādāya trayastriṃśadbhavanam
K10vimkn_u:2975: abhyudgatāni yaiḥ sopānair devās trayastriṃśato jambūdvīpam avataranty akṣobhyaṃ
K10vimkn_u:2976: tathāgataṃ darśanāya vandanāyai paryupāsanāya dharmaśravaṇāya jāmbudvīpakāś ca manuṣyās
K10vimkn_u:2978: evam apramāṇaguṇasamuditāṃ tām abhiratiṃ lokadhātum apskandham upādāya yāvad akaniṣṭhabhavanaṃ
K10vimkn_u:2979: bhārgavacakram iva paricchidya dakṣiṇena pāṇinā puṣpadāmam ivādāyemāṃ lokadhātuṃ praveśayeyam /
K10vimkn_u:2981: Vkn 11.5 atha vimalakīrtir licchavis tasyāṃ velāyāṃ tathārūpaṃ samādhim samāpannaḥ,
K10vimkn_u:2982: tādṛśaṃ carddhyabhisaṃskāram abhisaṃskṛtavān yas tam abhiratiṃ lokadhatuṃ paricchidya dakṣiṇena pāninā gṛhītvemaṃ sahaṃ lokadhātuṃ praveśayati sma /
K10vimkn_u:2983: Vkn 11.6 tatra ye divyacakṣuṣo 'bhijñāpratilabdhāḥ śrāvakā bodhisatvā devamanuṣyāś ca,
K10vimkn_u:2988: na mamātra vṛṣabhitā vimalakīrtinā bodhisatvena kriyamāṇānām /
K10vimkn_u:2990: te na jānanti na paśyanti ḥ kuto vayaṃ kriyāmaha iti /
K10vimkn_u:2991: na hy abhiratyā lokadhātor imaṃ sahaṃ lokadhātuṃ praveśitāyā ūnatvaṃ na pūrṇatvam abhūt /
K10vimkn_u:2992: na cāsya lokadhātor utpīḍo na saṃbādhaḥ /
K10vimkn_u:2995: Vkn 11.7 atha bhagavāñ śākyamunis tāṃ sarvāṃ parṣadam āmantrayate sma:
K10vimkn_u:2996: paśyata mārṣāḥ abhiratiṃ lokadhātum akṣobhyaṃ ca tathāgatam etāṃś ca kṣetravyūhāñ śrāvakavyūhān bodhisatvavyūhāṃś ca /
K10vimkn_u:2998: āha: īdṛśaṃ mārsāḥ buddhakṣetraṃ parigrahītukāmena bodhisatvenākṣobhyasya tathāgatasya bodhisatvacaryāyām anuśikṣitavyam /
K10vimkn_u:3000: saṃdarśane 'smin sahe lokadhātau caturdaśānām ayutānāṃ devamānuṣikāyāḥ prajāyā anuttarāyāṃ
K10vimkn_u:3002: sarvaiś cābhiratyāṃ lokadhātau praṇidhānam utpāditam upapattaye /
K10vimkn_u:3003: te sarve bhagavatā vyākṛtā abhiratyāṃ lokadhātāv upapattaye /
K10vimkn_u:3004: iti hi vimalakīrtir licchavir yāvān iha sahe lokadhātau satvaparipākaḥ kartavyas taṃ sarvaṃ kṛtvā punar eva tām abhiratiṃ lokadhātuṃ yathasthāne sthāpayamāsa /
K10vimkn_u:3005: Vkn 11.8 tatra bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputram āmantrayate sma:
K10vimkn_u:3006: dṛṣṭā te śāriputra abhiratir lokadhātuḥ sa cākṣobhyas tathagataḥ /
K10vimkn_u:3009: sarvasatvāś cedṛśyarddhyā samanvāgatā bhavantāṃ yādṛśyā vimalakīrtir licchaviḥ kulaputraḥ /
K10vimkn_u:3011: ye vayam īdṛśān satpuruṣān labhāmahe darśanāya /
K10vimkn_u:3012: teṣam api satvānāṃ sulabdhā lābhā bhaviṣyanti,
K10vimkn_u:3013: ya etarhi tathāgatasya tiṣṭhato vā parinirvṛtasya vemaṃ dharmaparyāyam antaśaḥ śroṣyanti /
K10vimkn_u:3015: ye śrutvādhimokṣyante pratyeṣyanty udgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanty
K10vimkn_u:3016: adhimokṣyanti pravartayiṣyanti parebhyaś ca vistareṇa saṃprakāśayiṣyanti bhāvanāyogam
K10vimkn_u:3025: ya imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ sulikhitaṃ kṛtvā dhārayiṣyanti satkariṣyanti /
K10vimkn_u:3029: ya ito dharmaparyāyād antaśaś catuṣpadikām api gāthāṃ saṃvaram api parebhyo vistareṇa deśayiṣyanti /
K10vimkn_u:3030: tad eva teṣāṃ bhagavan vyākaraṇaṃ yeṣām iha dharmaparyāye kṣāntī rucir matiḥ prekṣā dṛṣṭir adhimuktir muktiś ca bhaviṣyati // //
K10vimkn_u:3032: Vkn 12.1 atha khalu śakro devānām indro bhagavantam etad avocat:
K10vimkn_u:3033: bahuni me bhagavan tathāgatasyāntikān mañjuśriyaś ca kumārabhūtasyāntikād dharmaparyāyaśatasahasrāṇi śrutāni /
K10vimkn_u:3034: na ca me jātv evam acintyavimokṣavikurvitadharmanayapraveśaśrutapūrvo yādṛśa iha dharmaparyāye nirdiṣṭaḥ /
K10vimkn_u:3035: Vkn 12.2 niḥsaṃśayaṃ te satvā evaṃ dharmabhājanā bhaviṣyanti,
K10vimkn_u:3036: ya imaṃ dharmaparyāyam udgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti /
K10vimkn_u:3048: aham api bhagavan teṣāṃ kulaputrāṇām upasthānaparicaryāṃ kariṣyāmi sārdhaṃ sarvaparivāreṇa /
K10vimkn_u:3049: yatra ca grāmanagaranigamajanapadarāṣṭrarājadhānīṣv ayaṃ dharmaparyāyaḥ pracariṣyati deśayiṣyati saṃprakāśayiṣyati,
K10vimkn_u:3053: Vkn 12.4 evam ukte bhagavāñ śakraṃ devānām indram etad avocat:
K10vimkn_u:3056: yā devānām indra atītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ bodhir iha dharmaparyāya uddiṣṭā /
K10vimkn_u:3057: tasmād iha devendra atītānāgatapratyutpannās tena kulaputreṇa va kuladuhitrā vā buddhā bhagavantaḥ pūjitā bhaviṣyanti,
K10vimkn_u:3058: ya imaṃ dharmaparyāyam udgrahīṣyaty antaśaḥ pustakalikhitam api kariṣyati vācayiṣyati likhiṣyati paryavāpsyati /
K10vimkn_u:3059: Vkn 12.5 yaś ca punar devendra kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vemaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ
K10vimkn_u:3060: lokadhātuṃ tathāgatapūrṇaṃ tadyathāpi nāmekṣuvanaṃ vā naḍavanaṃ vā veṇuvanaṃ vā tilavanaṃ
K10vimkn_u:3061: vaivaṃ śālivanaṃ vā pratipūrṇaṃ kalpaṃ vā kalpāvaśeṣaṃ vā satkuryād gurukuryān mānayet
K10vimkn_u:3063: parinirvṛtānāṃ ca teṣāṃ tathāgatānām ekaikasya tathāgatasya pūjākarmaṇa ekaghanasyāvikopitasya
K10vimkn_u:3065: yāvad brahmalokam uccaistvena yaṣṭicchatrapatākābhir udviddhopaśobhitam evaṃ sarvatathāgatānāṃ
K10vimkn_u:3067: sa ca tatra kalpaṃ vā kalpāvaśeṣaṃ vā pūjāṃ kuryāt sarvapuṣpaiḥ sarvagandhaiḥ sarvadhvajapatākābhiḥ sarvatūryatāḍāvacarasaṃpravāditena pūjāṃ
K10vimkn_u:3068: tat kiṃ manyase devānām indra api nu sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tato nidānaṃ bahu puṇyaṃ prasunuyāt /
K10vimkn_u:3070: nāsya puṇyaskandhasya śakyaḥ paryanto 'dhigantuṃ kalpakoṭīśatasahasrair api /
K10vimkn_u:3074: ataḥ sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasunuyāt,
K10vimkn_u:3075: ya imam acintyavimokṣanirdeśaṃ dharmaparyāyam udgṛhṇīyād dhārayed vācayet paryavāpnuyāt /
K10vimkn_u:3077: dharmanirjātā hi devendra buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ bodhiḥ,
K10vimkn_u:3079: tad anenāpi te devendra paryāyeṇaivaṃ veditavyam /
K10vimkn_u:3080: Vkn 12.7 bhūtapūrvaṃ devānām indra atīte 'dhvany asaṃkhyeye kalpe 'saṃkhyeyatare
K10vimkn_u:3081: vipule 'pramāṇe 'cintye yad āsīt tena kālena tena samayena bhaisajyarājo nāma tathāgato
K10vimkn_u:3082: 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ
K10vimkn_u:3083: śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho bhagavān mahāvyūhe lokadhātau viśodhane kalpe /
K10vimkn_u:3084: tasya khalu punar devānām indra bhaiṣajyarājasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya viṃśatir antarakalpa āyuḥpramāṇam abhūt /
K10vimkn_u:3087: tena ca devānām indra kālena tena samayena ratnacchatro nāma rājābhūc cakravartī saptaratnasamanvāgataś caturdvīpeśvaraḥ /
K10vimkn_u:3088: paripūrṇaṃ cāsya putrasahasram abhūc chūrāṇāṃ varāṅgarūpiṇāṃ parasainyapramardakānām /
K10vimkn_u:3089: Vkn 12.8 tena khalu punaḥ samayena rājñā ratnacchatreṇa sa bhagavān bhaiṣajyarājas tathāgataḥ pañcāntarakalpān satkṛtaḥ saparivāraḥ sarvasukhopadhānena
K10vimkn_u:3090: iti hi devānām indra teṣāṃ pañcānām antarakalpānām atyayena sa rājā ratnacchatras tat putrasahasram āmantrayate sma:
K10vimkn_u:3094: iti hi devānām indra te rājakumārāḥ pitū rājño ratnacchatrasya ḥ sādhv iti pratiśrutya
K10vimkn_u:3095: sarve sahitāḥ samagrā aparān pañcāntarakalpāṃs taṃ bhagavantaṃ bhaiṣajyarājaṃ tathāgataṃ
K10vimkn_u:3097: Vkn 12.9 tataś caiko rājakumāraḥ somacchatro nāma /
K10vimkn_u:3099: asti tv asyāḥ pujāyā anyodāratā viśiṣṭatarā pūjeti /
K10vimkn_u:3102: sa evam āha: katamā punaḥ sā dharmapūjeti /
K10vimkn_u:3103: devatāha: etam eva tvaṃ satpuruṣa tathāgataṃ bhaiṣajyarājam upasaṃkramya paripṛccha ḥ katamā sā dharmapūjeti /
K10vimkn_u:3105: atha devānām indra sa somacchatro rājakumāro yena bhagavān bhaiṣajyarājas tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhas tenopasaṃkrāmat /
K10vimkn_u:3106: upasaṃkramya tasya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvaikānte 'sthāt /
K10vimkn_u:3107: ekāntasthitaś ca somacchatro rājakumāras taṃ bhagavantaṃ bhaiṣajyarājaṃ tathāgatam etad avocat:
K10vimkn_u:3111: dharmapūjā kulaputra yā tathāgatabhāṣitānāṃ sūtrāntānāṃ gambhīrāṇāṃ gambhīrāvabhāsānāṃ
K10vimkn_u:3112: sarvalokapratyanīkānāṃ duravagāhānāṃ durdṛśānāṃ duranubodhānāṃ sūkṣmāṇāṃ nipuṇānāṃ
K10vimkn_u:3122: evaṃrūpāṇāṃ sūtrāntānāṃ yā deśanā saṃprakāśanā dhāraṇā pratyavekṣaṇā saddharmasaṃgrahaḥ,
K10vimkn_u:3124: Vkn 12.12 punar aparaṃ kulaputra dharmapūjā yā dhārmeṣu dharmanidhyaptiḥ,
K10vimkn_u:3147: Vkn 12.13 iti hi devānām indra sa somacchatro rājakumāras tasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyarājasya tathāgatasyāntikād imāṃ dharmapūjāṃ śrutvānulomikīṃ dharmakṣāntiṃ pratilabhate sma /
K10vimkn_u:3148: yathāprāvṛtaiś ca vastrābharaṇais taṃ bhagavantaṃ chādayati,
K10vimkn_u:3150: ahaṃ bhagavan utsahe tathāgatasya saddharmaparigrahāya saddharmapūjākaraṇatāyai saddharmaṃ parirakṣitum /
K10vimkn_u:3153: tasya sa tathāgato 'dhyāśayaṃ viditvā vyākṛtavān paścime kāle saddharmanagarapālarakṣāyai /
K10vimkn_u:3154: Vkn 12.14 sa khalu punar devānām indra somacchatro rājakumāras tasya tathāgatasya
K10vimkn_u:3155: tiṣṭhata eva śraddhayāgārād anagārikāṃ pravrajitaḥ sann ārabdhavīryo viharati sma kuśaleṣu dharmeṣu /
K10vimkn_u:3156: tenārabdhavīryeṇa kuśaladharmapratiṣṭhitena na cirāt pañcābhijñā utpāditāḥ /
K10vimkn_u:3158: sa tasya bhagavataḥ parinirvṛtasyābhijñādhāraṇībalena paripūrṇān daśāntarakalpāṃs tasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyarājasya tathāgatasya pravṛttaṃ dharmacakram anuvartayati sma /
K10vimkn_u:3159: tena khalu punar devānām indra somacchatreṇa bhikṣuṇā saddharmaparigrahābhiyuktena daśakoṭīśatāni satvānām avaivartikāni kṛtāny abhūvann anuttarāyāṃ
K10vimkn_u:3162: Vkn 12.15 syāt khalu punas te devānām indra anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena ratnacchatro nāma rājābhūc cakravartī,
K10vimkn_u:3163: na khalu punas te devānām indra evaṃ draṣṭavyam /
K10vimkn_u:3165: ratnārciḥ sa tathāgatas tena kālena tena samayena ratnacchatro nāma rājābhūc cakravartī /
K10vimkn_u:3166: yat punas tad rājño ratnacchatrasya putrasahasram abhūt /
K10vimkn_u:3168: yad iha bhadrakalpe paripūrṇaṃ buddhasahasram utpatsyate yataś catvāra utpannāḥ śeṣā utpatsyante,
K10vimkn_u:3171: syāt khalu punas te devānām indra evam anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena somacchatro
K10vimkn_u:3172: nāma rājakumāro 'bhūd yena tasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyarājasya tathāgatasya saddharmaḥ parigṛhīta iti /
K10vimkn_u:3173: na khalu punas ta evaṃ draṣṭavyam /
K10vimkn_u:3175: ahaṃ sa tena kālena tena samayena somacchatro nāma rājakumāro 'bhūvam /
K10vimkn_u:3176: tad anenāpi te devendra paryāyeṇaivaṃ veditavyam /
K10vimkn_u:3179: jyeṣṭhā śreṣṭhā varā pravarā praṇītottarā niruttarākhyāyata iti /
K10vimkn_u:3180: tasmād iha devānām indra dharmapūjayā māṃ pūjayata,
K10vimkn_u:3184: Vkn 12.16 tatra bhagavān maitreyaṃ bodhisatvam āmantrayate sma:
K10vimkn_u:3185: imāṃ te 'haṃ maitreya asaṃkhyeyakalpakoṭīsamudānītām anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim anuparīndāmi,
K10vimkn_u:3186: yathema evaṃrūpā dharmaparyāyā yuṣmadadhiṣṭhānena parigraheṇa tathāgatasya parinirvṛtasya paścime kāle paścime samaye jambūdvīpe vaistārikā
K10vimkn_u:3189: bhaviṣyanti maitreya anāgate 'dhvani kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca devanāgayakṣagandharvāś cāvaropitakuśalā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ saṃprasthitāḥ
K10vimkn_u:3190: te 'śravaṇād asya dharmaparyāyasya mā parihāsyanta iti /
K10vimkn_u:3191: imān evaṃrūpān sūtrāntāñ śrutvātīva prema ca prasādaṃ ca pratilapsyante,
K10vimkn_u:3193: teṣāṃ tvaṃ maitreya tathārūpāṇāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ cānurakṣāyā imān evaṃrūpān sūtrāntāṃs tasmin kāle vaistārikān kuryāḥ /
K10vimkn_u:3194: Vkn 12.17 dve ime maitreya bodhisatvānāṃ mudre /
K10vimkn_u:3200: ye punar imaṃ maitreya gambhīraṃ sūtrāntam arūpalepaṃ yamakavyatyastanihārapadapuṭaprabhedaṃ pravartayiṣyanti śrosyanty adhimokṣyante vedayiṣyanti,
K10vimkn_u:3202: Vkn 12.18 tatra maitreya dvābhyāṃ kāraṇābhyām ādikarmikā bodhisatvā ātmānaṃ kṣiṇvanti /
K10vimkn_u:3203: na ca gambhīreṣu dharmeṣu nidhyaptiṃ gacchanti /
K10vimkn_u:3209: ya ete 'smābhiḥ pūrvaṃ na śrutapūrvāḥ kuta ime 'dhunāgatāḥ /
K10vimkn_u:3210: ye ca te kulaputrā gambhīradharmasūtrāntadhārakā gambhīradharmabhājanā gambhīradharmadeśayitāraḥ,
K10vimkn_u:3211: tān na sevante na bhajante na paryupāsante,
K10vimkn_u:3213: antarāntarā ca teṣām avarṇam api niścārayanti /
K10vimkn_u:3214: ābhyāṃ maitreya dvābhyāṃ kāraṇābhyām ādikarmikā bodhisatvā ātmānaṃ kṣiṇvanti /
K10vimkn_u:3215: na ca gambhīreṣu dharmeṣu nidhyaptiṃ gacchanti /
K10vimkn_u:3216: Vkn 12.19 dvābhyāṃ maitreya kāraṇābhyāṃ gambhīrādhimuktiko bodhisatva ātmānaṃ kṣiṇoti /
K10vimkn_u:3219: tāṃś cādikarmikān aciracaritān bodhisatvān avamanyate paribhavati na grāhayati na vivecayati nānuśāsti /
K10vimkn_u:3220: tayaiva ca gambhīrādhimuktyā śikṣāyām agauravo bhavati /
K10vimkn_u:3223: ābhyāṃ maitreya dvābhyāṃ kāraṇābhyāṃ gambhīrādhimuktiko bodhisatva ātmānaṃ kṣiṇoti /
K10vimkn_u:3224: na ca kṣipram anutpattikeṣu dharmeṣu kṣāntiṃ pratilabhate /
K10vimkn_u:3225: Vkn 12.20 evam ukte maitreyo bodhisatvo bhagavantam etad avocat:
K10vimkn_u:3227: vayaṃ bhagavan etāṃś ca doṣān vivarjayiṣyāmaḥ /
K10vimkn_u:3228: imāṃ ca tathāgatasyāsaṃkhyeyakalpakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrasamudānītām anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ parirakṣiṣyāmo dhārayiṣyāmaḥ /
K10vimkn_u:3229: teṣāṃ cānāgatānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ bhājanībhūtānām imān evaṃrūpān sūtrāntān hastagatān kariṣyāmaḥ /
K10vimkn_u:3230: smṛtiṃ caiṣām upasaṃhariṣyāmo yayā smṛtyemān evaṃrūpān sūtrāntān rocayiṣyanty udgrahīṣyanti
K10vimkn_u:3231: paryavāpsyanti dhārayiṣyanti pravartayiṣyanti likhiṣyanti pareṣāṃ ca vistareṇa deśayiṣyanti /
K10vimkn_u:3232: teṣāṃ ca vayaṃ bhagavan upastambhaṃ kariṣyāmaḥ /
K10vimkn_u:3233: ye ca khalu punar bhagavan tasmin kāla imān evaṃrupān sūtrāntān rocayiṣyanti pravartayiṣyanti /
K10vimkn_u:3234: veditavyam etad bhagavan maitreyasya bodhisatvasyādhiṣṭhānam iti /
K10vimkn_u:3235: atha bhagavān maitreyasya bodhisatvasya sādhukāram adāt:
K10vimkn_u:3239: Vkn 12.21 atha te bodhisatvā ekasvareṇa vācam abhāṣanta:
K10vimkn_u:3240: vayam api bhagavan tathāgatasya parinirvṛtasyānyonyebhyo buddhakṣetrebhya āgatyemāṃ tathāgatabuddhabodhiṃ vaistārikīṃ kariṣyāmaḥ /
K10vimkn_u:3242: Vkn 12.22 atha catvāro mahārājāno bhagavantam etad avocan:
K10vimkn_u:3243: yatra yatra bhagavan grāmanagaranigamarāṣṭrarājadhānīṣv ima evaṃrūpā dharmaparyāyāḥ pracariṣyanti deśayiṣyanti prakāśayiṣyanti,
K10vimkn_u:3244: tatra tatra vayaṃ bhagavan catvāro mahārājāḥ sabalāḥ savāhanāḥ saparivārā dharmaśravaṇāyopasaṃkramiṣyāmaḥ /
K10vimkn_u:3245: tasya ca dharmabhāṇakasya samantato yojanaśataṃ rakṣāṃ saṃvidhāṣyāmaḥ,
K10vimkn_u:3246: yathā tasya dharmabhāṇakasya na kaścid avatāraprekṣy avatāragaveṣy avatāraṃ lapsyate /
K10vimkn_u:3247: Vkn 12.23 tatra bhagavān āyuṣmantam ānandam āmantrayate sma:
K10vimkn_u:3248: udgṛhāṇa tvam ānanda imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ dhāraya vācaya pareṣāṃ ca vistareṇa saṃprakāśaya /
K10vimkn_u:3249: āha: udgṛhīto me bhagavan ayaṃ dharmaparyāyaḥ /
K10vimkn_u:3253: tasmāt tarhi tvam ānanda imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ vimalakīrtinirdeśaṃ yamakapuṭavyatyastanihāram acintyadharmavimokṣaparivartam ity api dhārayemaṃ dharmaparyāyam // //
K10vimkn_u:3255: āttamanā vimalakīrtir licchavir mañjuśrīś ca kumārabhūta āyuṣmāṃś cānandas te ca
K10vimkn_u:3256: mahāśrāvakāḥ sā ca sarvāvatī parṣat sadevamānuṣāsuragandharvaś ca loko bhagavato
K10vimkn_u:3259: ye dharmā hetuprabhavā hetuṃ teṣāṃ tathāgato hy avadat /
K10vimkn_u:3260: teṣāṃ ca yo nirodho evaṃvādī mahāśramaṇaḥ //
K10vimkn_u:3261: deyadharmo 'yaṃ pravaramahāyānayāyino bhikṣuśīladhvajasya yad atra puṇyaṃ tad bhavatv ācāryopādhyāyamātāpitṛpūrvaṃgamaṃ kṛtvā sakalasatvarāśer anuttarajñānaphalāvāptaya iti //
